[Yesuusiyoo "Ta nihoocho! Boonoshin maaribe! Ebi boonoshi shuunaa beeton ariyaaneena'one" iye.] Ebiyee gub, bi tahoon ixo kuxxiqqi qoodeeheete.

Aroochaa meeti asheena'o neexaqqi ciinaa beeheete. Ayihudee nallachina'o wotta "Bareena'on wodiihe; eke Yeeri doonjiiti Kiristoosi bi gaata, bi qelloon wodiibe!" iibee noonoon wuuqqiibee xayisheeheete.
Ginee naayina'o wotta bi waan katinniqqi kiikkaroon daammii, "Uye!" iqqi biich giddiichii,
"Ayihudeena'ochi taatoo ne gaata, ne qelloon wodiibe!" iqqi coonaheete.
Biyee took wotta "Hini Ayihudeena'ochi taatoone" ii beeti cuufo xogeetone.
Biinna tookkiqqi yooddati hukkachina'ochi daggoochee ikkoo "Ne Kiristoosi toono neena? Amoyich neennaa noonnon wodiyaachine?" iibee naagahe.
Tunaballi bara ikkoo tiyiqqi, "Bi toommooch nalleeti qitee nalloo ne toommooch wotta nalleetone. Illa amoyich Yeerin shattaachine?
Noolla no shuunooniye no deqqaa beeto; ebich no toommooch nalleeti nalloo tatoone; tunaballi hini uro bi shuunati gonda mooyo amolla aalloone" iqqi noggahe.
Aree hillooch Yesuusin "Doono Yesuuso! Ne taatittineech ne giyiyooba, taan battiyaahine!" iye.
Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi, "Neech ibaroon gettoye; hanaach yannatooch giyiree taanna tookki kotemmo neene" iye.

Hare shiritta saat bedoone; aree gaata aabee bekko mandarahe; yiixiya saatee wottoon ara shawoo bullichi toommoochee bekko aallahe. Arooba Yaafee Kexooch tipeeti maccillaatoo gutta daggoochaa kappheeqqi keexaa kechiye.
Yesuusiyoo oogichii cookiqqi, "Ta nihoocho! Ta kasheen ne kishooch beshiiqqa immato taane" iye. Ebin bi gettiyee, bi kasho abbatahe.
Aree gaata balla ginee iraashoo ebi tunati mooyon beeggiqqi, "Hini uro ibaroon cadiqoone" iqqi Yeerin oogiihe.
Tunemmi mooyon beegoyich dofee asheena'o kiceeqqi neexaa beeheete; ara asheena'o bulli ebi mooyon beeggiqqi boonoshi getoon qicciibee kexooch wottaheete.
Tunaballi Yesuusin arii beeti asheena'o bullinaa Galiilee shawoochee biin dabbiqqi waati genneena'ona ebi mooyon beeggiibee wohooch neexaa beeheete.
Arooba Ayihudee nallachina'ochi dageexi ikkoo, Yooseefi gettee beeti de'a cadiqa uro beehe;
Ara uro nallachina'ochi koceyoonaa boonoshi shuunoonooch bacceyaani ashoone; biyoo Arimaati gettee beeti Ayihudeena'ochi katameexi ashoone; aroo Yeerichi taatittinoon quyaa beeti uroone.
Biyoo Yihudee iraashoo Phelaaxoosichi aafooch giddaqqi, "Yesuusichi cahoon taach imbe!" ii qollaqqi daaggiihe.
Aroochee hammii Yesuusichi cahoon kindiiqqi muttee tupoochee shipati kaafanoona (macawoona) kaapiye; koniyolla bat duukkataani, ebiyee aaf xaqqee guudoochee gooshiiqqi bi shuuniiti opooch daammiye.

Daammii bi beetee, Galiilee shawooche Yesuusina tookkii waati genneena'o Yooseefin dabbii hammiqqi maashee opoon beeggiyeete; wotta cahoo aabicheeqqi bi duukkato gaata beeggiyeete. Wottaqqi boonoshi qeyii beeti kexooch hammiqqi qimaamoonaa huutoonon qanniiheete. Ayihudeena'ochi qanniyee aabo bi tunatoyich, dechra boonoshi Shambatoo giyi beddiye; shawoo xumahe. Muusichi calloochaa bi getteetoomon Shambatooba kashaqqi heechiyeete.
Batti batti shabaatee aabo, oogi shambatooba genneena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o kafee qaadooch tiyii, boonoshi qanniiti qimaamoon yechiqqi Yesuusi duukkati maashee opooch hammiyeete.
Boonoshi hammii shaggiyee, opee kellooch keppheeti xaqqee qeroo opee kellee noonoochee ikka bad gediraqqi bi wottoon beeggiyeete;
maac giyiqqi boonoshi ciinniyee, Doono Yesuusichi cahoo aallahe.
Ebichi naboyich boonoshi shaammii beetee, diqqich gutta asheena'o phaqqi beeti tahoon tahaqqi boonoshi waan waaheete.
Hini ara genneena'o keqqoona shataqqi shawooch boonoshi ciinnii beetee, ara asheena'o boonoshich ishichiyeete:- " 'Kashachon qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee amoyichiye ittoshi qaawii beeto?

Aroo hiniich aalloone;Yeeri qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee biin kechitone. Aaf Galiilee Shawooch beebee, ittoshich 'Ashi bushoo ta, axaaxachi asheena'ochi kishooch beshiiree imee, yooddaree keeja qemooba qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee ta keyo echataani mooyone' iqqi bi gettiton shalligibote!" iyeete.
Ishin boonoshi gettiyona, hini ara genneena'o Yesuusi gettiton shalligiyeete.
Ara maashoochee katamooch wottaa hammiqqi, ebi boonoshi beeggitonaa boonoshi waayato bullinon aaraa ikka Yesuusichi dabbeena'onaa biin dabbii beeti bareena'o bullinoyich gettiyeete.
Ebin mishiraachachina'oyich hammiqqi gettitina'o, Magidalachi Maariyami, Yowani, Yaaqoobichi indee Maariyaminaa boonoshina tookkii beeti bara genneena'onaniye.
Hini mooyo boonoshich daayino bi shaahitoyich, ara genneena'ochi yibbaatoon ibariyaaneena'one.
Tunaballi Pheexiroosi tiyiqqi maashee opooch wocciye; hammii shaggiqqinoo yittii bi ciinniyee, kaafano baach beehe; hini tunati mooyoyich shaammiibee mag wottaa hammiye.
Arooba Yesuusin dabbii beetina'oochee gutteena'o Yerusalemee, aaraa ikka kiilee metiroon wokkii beeti Mayoosi gettee beeti gafooch hammii beeheete;
hammiibee ebi tunati mooyo bullin tiijiqqi boonoshinaa boonoshina yibbaataa beeheete.
Yibbaataabee echee boonoshi beetee, Yesuusi bi qelloona boonoshi waan katinniqqi boonoshina tookkii gommon hammii beehe;
Tunaballi boonoshich bi tuusheetoyich, koni bi gaata ariyaaneena'one.
Yesuusi tiyiqqi "Gommon hammiibee hini ittoshi yibbaataa beeti mooyo amoone?" iqqi echahe. Ishichiqqi bi echahona, ayinoona boonoshi aafo maggaa beetee, neexaheete.
Boonoshi daggoochee Qalayoophi gettee beeti ikkoo "Yerusalem waa beeti iibbeena'oochee ne ikketo baachiya arooch shuuneeti mooyoyich dallaawoo?" iye.

Yesuusiyoo "Arochi amashoone?" iqqi echahe. Boonoshiyoo wochiqqi ishichiyeete:- "Naazireetachi Yesuusichi mooyone; biyoo Yeerinaa asho bullinochi aafooch gaakkachi shuunoon shuunatonaa kuppha qaaroon gettiti keemachonaniye;
Qeesheena'onaa bara no nallachina'ona Phelaaxoosi qitee nalloon bi toommooch nallemmoyich, 'Qitibe!' iqqi beshii immii yooddiiheete.
Tunaballi 'Isra'eeleena'on biisharee wodiiya wocheetone' iqqaaniye no gibanato. Wotta ebi mooyo bulli tunato hanaachi keeja qemoobaniye.
Wotta no daggooch beeti ikkikka genneena'o gettiti mooyo noon woriganikkiye; boonoshiyoo maaddee kafee qaadooch ara maashee opooch hammiqqi
bi cahoon muccaheete; aroochee wottaa waaqqi, ' "Yesuusi wochinnoon kashacho tunatone" iqqi gettiti shimaaji maraakeena'on beeggato noone' iyeete.
Wotta noonna tookkii beetina'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o maashee opooch hammiqqi, genneena'o gettito ibaroo bi tunoon beeggitina'one; tunaballi Yesuusin danataaneena'one" iyeete.
Yesuusiyoo "Hini mullaalleena'ote! Keemachina'o gettito bullin ibariyaanoon amoyichiye ittoshi yagii beeto?
Kiristoosi hini xuuxoon beego qaawiyaacha? Oogee yiiree xaa'ooch giyi bedaacha?" iye.
Aroyee gub Muusichi macaafoochee tiijiqqi keemachina'ochi macaafooch beddaahee kooreeti bi hajee mooyon biichiqqi boonoshich gettiye.
Hini gutta asheena'o boonoshi hammii beeti gafooch katinniyeete; tunaballi Yesuusi ara gafoon besharee hammemmo boonoshich bi shaahee,
"Noonna tookkiree qebe! Shawoo beshatone; shawoo xumatone" iqqi manjii ataalliyeete. Ebich boonoshina tookkii qeya giyiye.
Boonoshina tookkii maayoon maaya madooch kotaabee, koshon tiijiqqi Yeerin gallatahe; tiichiqqinoo boonoshich immiye.
Aree gaata boonoshi mullo qecheetee, Yesuusi bi tunoon ariiheete; biyoo bekkach boonoshi aafoochee shiwirimmiye.
Boonoshinaa boonoshina ishichiyeete:- "Gommona tookkiqqa no waa beetee, Yaafa Macaafooch kooreeton biichii nooch bi gettiyona, no mullo am shaahoon qeecciye!" iyeete.
Bekkach aree gaata hini ara gutta asheena'o tiyii Yerusalem wottaqqi, ikkooch kiceeqqi beeti aaraa ikka Yesuusichi dabbeena'onaa boonoshina tookkii beetina'onon ikkooch danaheete.
Hini kiceeti asheena'o "Ibaroon Doono qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee kechitone! Simoonich bekkatone" iyeete.
Wotta oha gutteena'oo gommona hammii boonoshi beetee tunati mooyon, wotta koshon tiijii Yeerin gallataqqi tiichii bi immiyee, bekkach biin boonoshi ariyoon gettiyeete.
Hini ara gutta asheena'o ebin yibbaataa boonoshi beetee, diqqoona Yesuusi boonoshi daggooch neexahe. Boonoshich "Diggoo ittoshich tunabe!" iye.
Tunaballi keqqoona shataheete; yoogo boonoshich bekkaton shaahiiheete.
Biyoo "Amoyichiye ittoshi keqqii beeto? Ittoshi mullo amoyichiye meeti gommooch shacaa bi beeto?

Yesuusi ta tunoon ta kishoonaa ta baatoonon beegote! Taalli, baroo toonoone; taan yeshi beegote! Ittoshi beeggii beetoomon taach meenonaa shaawishona beetone; yoogoyich meenonaa shaawishona aalloone" iye.
Ishin boonoshich gettiichii bi kishoonaa bi baatoonon bekkiihe.
Boonoshiyoo emiroochee tiyitona bi gettiti mooyon ibariyoon hakkaaneena'one. Ebich woriganaa boonoshi beetee, "Manjeeyemmi maayo ittoshi waan aalla?" iqqi echahe.
Boonoshiyoo micheeti haashee qaton immiyeete.
Aroon yechiqqi boonoshi aafoochaa maahe.

Boonoshichoo "Ebiyee aaf ittoshina tookkii beebee, 'Muusichi Callee Macaafoonaa Keemachina'ochi Macaafoonooch, Yaafa Shoddee macaafoochoo kooreeti ta mooyo bulli ceeno echataachemmi mooyone' ta ito ebiniye" iye.
Aree gaata Yaafa Macaafooch kooreeton boonoshi xiishemmoyich, boonoshi mulloon qechiye;
boonoshich ishichiye:- " 'Kiristoosi xuuxoon beeggemmone; bi keeja qemooba qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee kechemmone;
Bi wochatina'oo Yerusalemee tiijiree aagateena'o bulliichi beddaahee hamiree "Axaaxee gommoochee Yeer waan wottabote! Yeeriyoo ittoshi axaaxoon maaremmone" getiree gettemmina'one' getee kooreetone.
Ittoshiyoo ebi mooyo bullich miixoo ittoshine.
Illa ellabote! Ta nihoo Yeeri gibanikkiti gibanoon ta ittoshich deejemmo taane; ebich damba Yeer waanee giidoo ittoshi toommooch bi kindimmi wottoon Yerusalem quyabote!" iye.
Ebiyee gub, Yerusalemee Bitaani katinooch beddaahee boonoshin dabbiiqqi daammiye; aroochaanoo bi kishoon tiijiqqi boonoshin diiriibee,
boonoshiyee bariqqi shimaaj hammiye.
Boonoshiyoo aroochaa biich goyinnaachii, woddoon emiriibee Yerusalem wottaheete;
kuxaanoon Yeerin gallataabee, Yaafee Kexooch heechii beeheete.
Shawoonaa shimaayoona halleyaan beehooba, Qaaro beehe; hini Qaaro Yeer waan beehe; biyoo bi qelloona Yeerine.
Aroo bulliyee aaf Yeerina tookkii beehe.
Yeeri bulli mooyon biinna halliihe; halleetina'ochi daggoochee ikkolla bi aalloon halleeto aalloone.
Aroo bi qelloona kashachone; ara kasho ashoyich bekkoone.
Hini ara bekko mandaroon bekkii beetone; mandaroo biin qeroon hakkaanoone.
Yeer waanee wocheeti, Yowannisi gettee beeti ikka uro beehe.
Biyoo asho bulli waayaree bi mulloon bekkoochi toommooch bi too'iiyemmoyich, ara bekkeechon miixiya waahe.
Ebi bekkeechon miixiya waahalli, aroo bi qelloona ara bekko toonoone.
Ara bekko shawee toommooch waabee, asho bullich bekkii beeti ibara bekkoone.
Ara Qaaro shawee toommooch beehe; shawoonaa bi toommooch beeto bullina halleeto biinnaniye; tunatee shawee toommooch beeti asheena'o bi koni gaata ariyaaneena'one.
Bi hajee shawooch waahe; bi hajee asheena'o "Hini Yeer waanee waato toonoone" iqqi qajiyeete.
Tunaballi Yeer waanee bi womon ibariiqqi boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iitina'o bullich Yeerichi Bushiishoo tunee hakkoon immiye.
Yeerichi Bushiishoo boonoshi tunato, Yeer waanee boonoshi shiijoonalli, ashi yarooche, oohee ashi qaatooche, oohee anaamochi gaboochee shiijoona toonoone.
Ara Qaaro ashoon tunahe; Yeerichi wojoonaa ibaroona bi toommooch meettiqqi bekkaatee noonna tookkii beehe; bi Nihoyich ikka mixxa Bushoo bi tunatoyich, bi waanee bi deqqiti oogee yiiroon beeggahone.
Ebin Yowannisi bi qaaroon oogichiqqi gettiye; ishichiinoo iye:- " 'And ta hillooch waa beeto, ta shiijataan beehooba beetone; ebich tayee beshoone' iqqa ta gettato ebine" iibee miixahe.
Bi toommooch meettiqqi bekkati wojoochee no bulli wojee toommooch wojoon deqqato noone.
Yeerichi calloo Muusina kindiye; tunaballi wojoonaa ibaroona Yesuus Kiristoosina kindiye.
Yeerin bi aafoona beeggito koniyolla aalloone; tunaballi bi Nihoochi sheenooch beeti ikka bi Bushoo kindiqqi bekkiitone.

Yerusalem beeti Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o tiyiqqi qeesheena'onaa Leweena'onochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'on "Hamiree Yowannisin 'Ne koni neene?' getiree echabote!" iqqi wochaheete. Arooba wocheetina'oyich Yowannisi ishichiqqi miixahalli,
nookkataanoone; boonoshich "Kiristoosi toono taane" iqqi xallaayii gettiye.
"Ishi gaata, ne koni neene? Eliyaasi neena?" iqqi echaheete. "Ta Eliyaasi toono taane" iye. " 'Woyemmone' gettee beeti keemacho neena?" iqqi echaheete. "Toono taane" iqqi wochiye.
"Ishi gaata, ne koni neene? Noon wochatina'oyich no gettemmon nooch gete! Koni taane gettenne?" iyeete.
Biyoo wochiqqi, "Keemachi Isiyaasi gettitoomon ' "Doonochi gommon kaachi qaxxabote!" iibee barahoochaa cookii beeti ashi qaaro' taane" iye.
Arooba Fariseena'o waanee wocheetina'o
" Ishi gaata, ne Kiristoosi, oohee Eliyaasi, oohee 'Woyemmone' gettee beeti keemacho ne toonee gaata, amoyichiye asheena'on aacona ne afaallii beeto?" iqqi echaheete.
Yowannisi wochiqqi, "Ta, aacona afaallii beeto taane; tunaballi ittoshi ariyaano ittoshi daggooch neexaa beetone;
Ta bi caammee cuyoon biich ta bedaani, ta hillooch waa beeto aroone" iye.
Hini mooyo bulli bi tunato, Bitaani gafoochaananiye; Bitaani bi beeto, Yowanisi aacona afaalliibee bi echati Yooridanoosi Aacoyee beqachiye.
Bi dechara Yowannisi bi waan Yesuusichi womon beeggiqqi ishichiye:- "Ebiyoche, shawee toommooch beeti asheena'ochi axaaxoon hidi wokkiiyemmi Yeerichi Bago!
'Ikka uro ta hillooch waa beetone; aroo ta shiijoyee aaf beetone; ebich tayee beshoone' iqqa ta gettato ebine.
Tawo ameexo bi gaata arooba ariyaano taane; tunaballi Isra'eeleena'o biin boonoshi ariiyemmoyichiye aacona afaalliibee ta waato" iye.
Daakkiqqi ishichii miixahe:- "Yeerichi Ayaano bi ashittinee halloo uggechoomon tunaqqi shimaayoochee kindii bi toommooch bi kotoon beeggato taane.

Tawoo koni bi gaata arooba ariyaan beeto taane; tunaballi aacona ta afaallemmoyich shiichiqqi taan deejiti aroo 'Ayaano kindiree bi toommooch bi kotatee ne beeggemmo, Yaafa Ayaanoona afaallemmo aroone' iqqi taach gettiye.
tawoo ebin ta aafoona beeggato taane; biyoo Yeerichi Bushoo bi tunoon miixato taane" iye.
Wotta bi dechara Yowannisi gutta bi dabbeena'ona tookkii neexaa beehe.
Neexaabee, Yesuusin hammii bi beetee beeggiqqi, "Ebiyoche! Yeerichi Bago!" iye.
Gutta bi dabbeena'o Yowannisi ishichoon waayaqqi Yesuusin dabbii hammiyeete.
Biin dabbii beeti asheena'on Yesuusi gub wottaa ciinniqqi, "Amooniye ittoshi qaawii beeto?" iye. Boonoshiyoo "Rabbi! Ne beeto aabiichiye?" iqqi echaheete. "Rabbi!" geto "Dojachocho!" getone.
Yesuusi boonoshin "Waaree beegote!" iye. Boonoshiyoo hammiqqi bi beeti xaa'oon beeggiyeete. Arooba boonoshi hammito aashira saat bedoochiye. Bi waanoo xumaheete.
Yowannis waanee waayaqqi Yesuusin dabbiti gutteena'oochee ikkoo Simoon Pheexiroosichi manoo Indiriyaasine.
Biyoo Yesuus waanee kechii hammii shiichii bi hajee manoo Simoon waan shaggii, "Masiihin danato noone" iye. "Masiihi" geto "Kiristoosi" getone.

Aroochee Indiriyaasi Simoonin Yesuus waan deebiye. Yesuusiyoo beeggiqqi, "Ne Simooni neene; ne nihoochi shigo wotta Yoonine; and Keefi getee ceeggeeyemmo neene" iye. "Keefi" geto "Pheexiroosi" oohee "Xaqqo" getone.
Bi dechara Yesuusi Galiilee Shawooch hamma tiyiye; Filipphoosinoo danaqqi, "Taan dabbibe!" iye.
Filipphoosiyoo Indiriyaasinaa Pheexiroosina beeti Beteshayidi Katameexi ashoone.
Aroo Naatinaa'eelin danaqqi, "Muusi bi callee Macaafooch, keemachina'o wotta biichon boonoshi kooriti Yooseefichi bushoo, Naazireetachi Yesuusin danato noone" iye.
Naatinaa'eeliyoo "Naazireetee de'a mooyo kecheha?" iqqi echahe. Filipphoosiyoo "Waaree beege!" iye.
Naatinaa'eeli bi waan womon Yesuusi beeggiqqi ishichiye:- "Dawushoon ariyaani ibara Isra'eelee asho hinine" iye.
Naatinaa'eeli Yesuusin "Amoochaa taan ariinne?" iqqi echahe. Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi, "Filipphoosi neen ceegaan beetee, balasee michi yiirooch kotaa ne beetee, neen beeggato taane" iye.
Naatinaa'eeli wochiqqi, "Dojachocho! Ne Yeerichi Bushoo neene; ne Isra'eelee Taatoo neene" iye.
Yesuusi wochiqqi, " 'Balasee michi yiirooch kotaa ne beetee, neen beeggahoye' iqqa ta gettatoyich ibariinne? Gub ebiyee besha mooyon beeggemmo neene" iye.
"Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Shimaayoo qecheetee, Yeerichi maraakeena'o Ashi Bushoo ta toommooch keyi kindi boonoshi beetee, beeggemmo ittoshine" iye.
Keejinnee qemooba Galiilee Shawooch beeti Qaani Katamooch gaaro geddeehe. Yesuusichi indee ara gaarooch beehan.
Yesuusinaa bi dabbeena'ona wotta ara gaarooch ceeggeeqqi hammitina'one.
Woyinee uyo ciiratee, Yesuusichi indee biich "Woyinee uyo boonoshich ciiratoche!" iyan.
Yesuusiyoo "Hini ureene! Ta shuunee daggooch giyaahine! Shuunoyich ta tiyemmi saato bat bedaan beetone" iye.
Arooba Yesuusichi indee qoomachina'oyich "Ittoshich bi gettiyo bullin tuniibote!" iyan.

Ayihudeena'o ceechii beeti xallee doyoyich kotati shiritta xaqqee shareena'o (gaaneena'o) arooch beetina'one; ara shareena'oo boonoshi qelli qelloona gutta oohee keeja geetee aacon yechii beetina'one.
Yesuusiyoo qoomachina'on "Shareena'ooch aacon ceechibote!" iye. Shareena'ooch aacon cipphaayii ceechiyeete.
"And kitiree qoomachina'ochi ukkuroyich imbote!" iye. Boonoshiyoo kittiqqi immiyeete.
Ukkuroo woyinee uyo tunati aacon bi napphahee, amoochee bi waato gaata ariyaanoone; tunaballi aacon kittiti qoomachina'o arii beetina'one. Ebich qoomachina'ochi ukkuroo wo'ee kenoon ceeggiqqi,

"Asho bulli shiichiqqi bi giddii beeto shaawi wuura uyooniye; iibbeena'o uchii michitoyee gubbiye waaroon bi giddii beeto; tunaballi ebi shaawi woyinee uyoon and beddaahee asheena'oyich imaano neene" iye.
Yesuusi hini mallatoon shiichiqqi Galiilee Shawooch beeti Qaani Katamoochaa tuniihe; arooba bi oogee yiiroon bekkiihe. Ebich bi dabbeena'o boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iiheete.
Ebiyee gub Yesuusi bi inde, bi maneena'onaa bi dabbeena'ona tookkii Qifirnaahi Katamooch kindiye; aroochoo giishacha aaboon kotaheete.
Ayihudeena'ochi Beshee Baaroo katinniye. Ebich Yesuusi Yerusalem hammiye.
Yaafee Kechi kakallee daggooch gatteena'on, bageena'onaa uggeena'onon kemmii beetina'on, wotta gijoon shaddii beetina'onoo kotaa boonoshi beetee danahe.
Wodaree yaraafoon yexxiqqi (wodariqqi) bullin, bageena'onoo, gatteena'onoo, Yaafee Kechi kakalloochee kichiye; gijee shaddachina'ochi gijoon shacciye; boonoshi gafatoon yangiye;
uggoon kemmii beetina'on "Ittoshi uggoon hiniichee kichibote! Ta Nihoochi kexon giixee kexon tuniyaahotine!" iye.
Bi dabbeena'o "Ne kechi qanaato taan michemmone" getee kooreyoon shalligiyeete.
Yesuusi ebi bullin yaafee kechi kakallee daggoochaa bi tuniitoyich, Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o tiyiqqi, "Ebin tuniiya Yeer waanee ne womoyich amee mallatoo neech beete? Eke nooch bekkiibe!" iyeete.
Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Hini yaafee kexon hapibote! Ta keeja qemona wochiree haggemmo taane" iye.
Ebich Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o "Hini yaafee kexo hagee bi qannito aabbaa shiritta natonaniye; tunaballi ebin keeja qemona wochiree haggenne?" iyeete.
Arooba Yesuusi "Yaafee kexo" iqqi bi gettito, bi ashittinoonalli hini yaafee kexon toonoone.
Ebich Yeeri qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee biin bi kichitoyee gub, bi dabbeena'o ebi bi gettiton shalligiyeete; Yaafa Macaafoochoo kooreetonaa Yesuusi gettiti qaaroonon ibariiheete.
Beshee Baarooba, Yesuusi Yerusalem beebee bi tuniiti mallateena'on beeggiqqi meeti asheena'o boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iiheete.
Tunaballi Yesuusi asho bullin arii beetone; ebich boonoshin gibanataanoone.
Biyoo bi qelloona ashi mullooch beeti mooyon bi arii beetoyich, ashi mooyon biich ashi miixo amolla qaawiyaanoone.
Fariseena'ochi guuphi daggooch Ayihudeena'ochi nallacho tunati Niqoodimoosi gettee beeti ikka uro beehe.

Biyoo xumoona Yesuus waan waaqqi, "Dojachocho! Yeeri biinna tookkii tunatoyee damba, ne tunii beeti hini woriganikkiti mallateena'on tuniyoon koniyolla hakkaache. Ebich Dojacho tunaqqa Yeer waanee ne womon arii beeto noone" iye.
Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi, "Ibaroon neech gettoye:- Koniyolla bi tunatee, guttinnoon bi shiijo qayi gaata, Yeerichi taatittineen beegon hakkaachemmone" iye.
Niqoodimoosiyoo "Asho bi geenatoyee gub, aabichiree shiijoon hakkehe? Guttinnoon bi indee maacooch giyiree shiijoon hakkeha?" iqqi echahe.
Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Ibaroon neech gettoye:- Koniyolla bi tunatee, aaconaa Ayaanoonoochee bi shiijo qayi gaata, Yeerichi taatittineech gimon hakkaachemmone.
Meenona shiijato meenone; Ayaanoona shiijato ayaanoone.
'Guttinnoon shiijo ittoshich qaawiihe' ta itoyich, woriganiyaahine!

Yongo biich kaamammoochiye bi yongaa beeto; bi qaaroonoo waayahine' tunaballi amoochee bi waa beeto gaata, amooch bi hammii beeto gaatoo ariyaachine. Yeerichi Ayaanoochee shiijato bulli ebiyoomone" iye.
Niqoodimoosiyoo wochiqqi, "Ebi aabichiree tunehe?" iqqi echahe.
Yesuusi wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Ne, Isra'eeleena'ochi daggooch ooga dojacho tunaa beechaa, ebin ariyaachine?
Ibaroon neech gettoye:- No arii beeton gettahone; no beeggaton miixahone; tunaballi no miixaton ibariyaachotine.
Shaweexi mooyon ta getee, ittoshi ibariyaan gaata, shimaayeexi mooyon ta getee, aabichiree ibariiyehotine?
Shimaayoochee kinditoyee damba shimaayooch kechito koniyolla aalloone; ebiyoo Ashi Bushoo taane.
Muusi ashi kishoona halleeti dingaroon barahoochaa michi toommooch bi yoodoomon, Ashi Bushoo ta yooddeyoo taach qaawiihe;
Ebi tunemmo, bi mulloon ta toommooch too'ii beeto bulli, bulli yemeenee kashoon bi danemmoyichiye.

"Yeeri shawee toommooch beeti asheena'on oogichii bi shunnitoyich ikka bi Bushoon immiye; hini ikka bi Bushoon bi immito, bi mulloon bi toommooch too'ii beeto bulli, bulli yemeenee kashoon bi danemmonaa shiwaree qaaqqooch bi giyaachemmonoyichiye.
Yeeri bi Bushoon shawee toommooch bi deejito, arooch beeti asheena'on bi wodiiyemmoyichalli, boonoshi toommooch bi nallemmoyich toonoone.

Bi mulloon bi Bushoochi toommooch too'ii beetochi toommooch nallaachemmone; tunatee bi mulloon bi Bushoochi toommooch too'iyaano, bi mulloon ikka bi Bushoochi toommooch too'iyoo bi qajitoyich, wond bi toommooch Yeeri nallitone.
Bekko shawee toommooch waahe; tunaballi asheena'o boonoshi shuunoo gondo bi tunatoyich, bekkoyee mandaroon shunniyeete; bi nallito ebichiye.
Gonda mooyon shuunaa beeto bulli bekkoon shunnaanoone; bi gonda shuunoo bi bekkataachemmoyich, bekko beetooch keyaache;
Tunatee ibaroo tunati mooyon shuunaa beeto, Yeeri gettiton bi shuuno bekkemmoyich, bekko beetooch kechii beetone" iye.
Ebiyee gub, Yesuusinaa bi dabbeena'ona Yihudee Shawooch hammiyeete; boonoshina tookkii giishacha shabaattoon arooch kotaqqi asheena'on aacona afaallii beehe.

Arooba Yowannisi wotta Saliimee Shawee katinooch Heenoon gettee beeti xaa'ooch gabini aaco beetoyich, aroochaa asheena'on aacona afaallii beehe; asheena'oo bi waan waa beeheete; biyoo boonoshin aacona afaallii beehe.
Arooba Yowannisi bat cuyee kexooch giyaan beetone.
Yowannisichi dabbeena'onaa ikka Ayihudoonochi daggooch xalliyee doyee gajiteyoo tiyiye.

Hini bi dabbeena'o Yowannis waan waaqqi, "Dojachocho! Yooridanoosi Aacoyee beqach neenna tookkii beebee echato, newoo biichon ne miixato, ebiyoche, asheena'on aacona afaallii beetone; asho bulli bi waan hammii beetone" iyeete.
Yowannisi ishichiqqi wochiye:- "Yeeri daaggaan gaata, ebiyoomi mooyon koniyolla tuniyoon hakkaache.
'Kiristoosi toono taane; tunaballi biyee shiichii wocheeto taane' iqqa ta getoyich ta miixoo ittoshine.
Wo'e bi kenoochine; neexaqqi waayaa beeti miyaatoo wo'ee kenoochi qaaroona oogichii emirii beetone. Illa ebina ta emiroo ceennitone.
Bi oogo beshibe; ta oogo giishabe; ebi tun beda mooyone" iye.
"Damba shimaayoochee waa beeto bulliyee beshoone; dechi shawoochee tunaa beeto shaweexone; shawee toommeexi mooyoniye bi gettii beeto. Shimaayoochee waa beeto bulliyee beshoone.
Bi beeggitonaa bi waayatonon miixaa beetone; tunaballi bi miixaa beeton ibarii beeto koniyolla aalloone.
Bi miixaa beeton ibariito, Yeeri ibaroo bi tunoon miixatone.
Yeeri wochato, Yeerichi wochoon gettii beetone; Ebiyoo Yeeri bi Ayaanoon shapiiqqi biich imo bi qajitoyichiye.
Nihoo Yeeri bi Bushoon shunnii beetone; bullin biich hajiitone.
Bi mulloon bi Bushoochi toommooch too'ii beeto, bulli yemeenee kashachone; bi Bushoo getee waayataano Yeerichi kaaree shiixxee daggoochalli bi beeto, bulli yemeenee kashoon danataachemmone" iye.
Arooba Doono Yesuusi Yowannisiyee beshoon dofee asheena'on bi dabbiyoonaa aacona bi afaalloonon Fariseena'o waayaheete;
Tunaballi aacona afaallii beetina'o bi dabbeena'oalli, bi toonoone.
Yesuusi asheena'o biichon boonoshi yibbaatoonoo ariiqqi, Yihudee Shawoochee tiyii Galiilee Shawooch wottaqqi hamma tiyiye.
"Shamaaree Shawooch shagaanoon hamaache" iqqi
aroona Shamaaree Shawooch beeti Sikaari Katamooch shaggiye. Ara katamoo Yaaqoobi bi bushoo Yooseefich bi immiti shawee ga'oochiye.
Arooch Yaaqoobichi aachi opo beetone. Yesuusiyoo gommi sha'oona maraataqqi arooch kashiya aachi opee gashooch kotahe; arooba araddee shiritta saat bedoone.

Bi dabbeena'o manjeeyemmi maayoon kemiya katamooch hammiyeete. Aree hillooch ikka Shamaarachi ure aacon kitta, ara aachi opo beetooch waahan. Yesuusi ara ureen "Aacoochee kitiree taach imbe! Uyane" iye.

Shamaarachi ure wochiqqa, "Ne Ayihudee asho tunaachaa, Shamaarachi ure ta waanee aabichiqqa aacon ucha qollanne?" iyan. Ishichiqqa bi gettato, Shamaaree asheena'o kishoona boonoshi yechiti qiicoon Ayihudeena'o qeshaa beetoyichiye.
Yesuusi wochiqqi ureyich "Yeeri immii beeti wojoonaa 'Aacon taach imbe! Uyana' ii beeti ta koni ta tunoonon ne ariito gaata, ne taan qolleshi neene; tawoo kashee aacon neech immesho taane" iye.
Ure "Ta Doonocho! Ne kittemmi qiico neech aalloone; aachi opoo genjoone. Illa kashee aacon amoochee deebenne?
Hini aachi opoon nooch immito no qaabbachi nihoo Yaaqoobine; biyoo, bi bushiishoo, bi miimo bulliyoo hiniichee uchitina'one. Newochi biyee besho neena?" iyan.
Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi, "Hini aacoochee uchii beeto bulli wochinnoon shachawemmone;
Tunaballi ta immaa beeti aacoochee uchii beeto koniyolla bulli yemeenoon shachawataachemmone. Ta immaa beeti aaco bi maacooch bulli yemeenee kasho xuupphii beeti kashee tunoo tunemmone" iye.
Ure "Ta Doonocho! Ta shachawataachemmoyich, wochinnoon aacon kitta hiniich ta waataachemmoyich, ara aacon taach imbe!" iyan.
Yesuusi "Hamiree ne kenoon ceegiree deebe!" iye.
Ure wochiqqa, "Keno taach aalloone" iyan. Yesuusiyoo " 'Keno taach aalloone' ne geto ibaroone.
Ebiyee aaf uucha kenachi neene; tunaballi and neenna tookkii beeto ne keno toonoone. Ebich ne gettato ibaroone" iye.
Ure "Ta Doonocho! Keemacho ne tuno taach bekkaa beete.
No qaabbachina'o hini guudoochaa Yeerich goyinnaheete. Ayihudo ittoshiyoo 'Asho Yeerich goyinni beda xaa'oo Yerusalem ikketoalli, baroo aalloone' iyotine" iyan.
Yesuusi ureyich ishichiye:- "Hini ureene! Ta gettaa beeton ibariibe! Hini guudoochaa tunabe, Yerusalemaa tunabe, Nihoo Yeerich ittoshi goyinnataachemmi yemeeno woyemmone.
Ittoshi gaata, ittoshi ariyaanoyich goyinnaa beeto ittoshine; Yeeri Ayihudeena'ochi gommona asheena'o bullich wodoon imma bi gibanikkitoyich, Ayihudo no, no arii beetoyich goyinnaa beeto noone.

Tunaballi ibarittinoona goyinnaa beetina'o, Nihoo Yeerich Yaafa Ayaanee hakkoonaa ibarittinoona boonoshi goyinnemmi yemeeno woyemmone; andoo waatone; Nihoo Yeeri biich boonoshi goyinnemmoyich eboshiyoomina'on qaawii beetone.
Yeeriyoo ayaanoone; biich goyinnaa beetina'o Yaafa Ayaanee hakkoonaa ibarittinoona goyinno boonoshich qaawiihe" iye.
Ure "Kiristoosi gettee beeti Masiihi bi woyemmon arii beeti taane; bi waahooba bullin kaachiree nooch gettemmone" iyan.
Yesuusiyoo "And neech gettaa beeto, aroo taane" iye.

Arooba bi dabbeena'o boonoshi hammitoochee wottaa waaqqi, Yesuusi ureena tookkii bi yibbaatoyich, woriganaheete; tunaballi boonoshi daggoochee koniyolla ureen "Amoon qaawii beetine?" oohee Yesuusin "Amoyichiye ureena tookkii ne yibbaataa beeto?" ito aalloone.
Ure ara xaa'ooch aachi qondoon dupaachaa katamooch hammahan. Arooch beeti asheena'oyich
"Ta tuniito bullin taach gettiti uroon waaree beegote! Aroo Kiristoosi tuneha?" iyan.
Ebina waayatina'o katamoochee kechiqqi ara Yesuusi beetooch hammiyeete.
Ebi tunaa beetee, bi dabbeena'o "Dojachocho! Maayoon mame!" iqqi ataalliyeete.
Tunaballi aroo "Ittoshi ariyaani maayo taach beetone" iye.
Ebich bi dabbeena'o boonoshinaa boonoshina "Bi maayemmi maayoon asho biich deebito tuneha?" iyeete.
Yesuusi wochiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Taach maayo geto, taan wochatochi daaggoon ceechoonaa bi shuunoon ciichoonaniye.
Ittoshi 'Bat maayi qecoyich awudda agano echate' ii beetaachotina? Ittoshich gettoye:- Gochati maayoon manjii ciinote! Maayo qecceeya bedditone.
Andolla qeccii beeto bi caajee gatiyoon deqqii beetone; shookkachonaa qeccachona ikkooch tookkiree boonoshi emiremmoyich, qeccii beeto aafati maayoon bulli yemeenee kashoyich kicii beetone.
Ebich 'Ikkoo shookkiye; ikkoo qecciye' immi yibbaatoo ibaroo tunatone.
Tawoo ittoshi maraatataanoon ittoshi qeccemmoyich ittoshin daachiihoye. Bareena'o maraataheete; ittoshiyoo boonoshi maraataton qecciyotine" iye.
Arooba ure "Ta tuniito bullin taach gettiye" iqqa bi miixati qaaroona ara katamooch beeti Shamaaree asheena'ochi daggoochee meetina'o boonoshi mulloon Yesuusichi toommooch too'iiheete.
Shamaaree asheena'o Yesuus waan waaqqi, "no waan kotabe!" iqqi qollaheete. Yesuusiyoo arooch gutta qeyiye.
Aaf urechi noonoochee waayatina'oye, Yesuusichi noonoochee waayatina'ochi daggoochee meetina'o boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iiheete.

Ureyichoo "And no mulloon bi toommooch no too'iito, ne noonoochee no waayatoyich toonoone; no no qelloona bi noonoochee waayaqqa, ibaroon shawee toommooch beetina'o bullin Wodiyacho bi tunoon no ariitoyichiye" iyeete.
Gutta qemoyee gub Yesuusi aroochee kechiqqi Galiilee Shawooch hammiye.
Ebiyee aaf Yesuusi "Keemachon bi shiijee shaweexi asheena'o oogiyaachemmina'one" iqqi gettitone.

Galiilee Shawooch bi waahee, Galiilee Shawee asheena'o kechiqqi biin giijiyeete. Ebin boonoshi tuniito, boonoshi qelloona wotta baaroyich Yerusalem boonoshi hammiyooba Yesuusi aroochaa bi shuunato bullin boonoshi beeggitoyichiye.
Yesuusi aacon woyinee uyo bi tuniiti, Galiilee Shawooch beeti, Qaani Katamooch wochinnoon wottaqqi hammiye. Arooba Qifirnaaha bi bushoo biiyati ikka taatee naayo beehe.
Biyoo Yesuusi Yihudee Shawoochee Galiilee Shawooch bi womon waayahe; bi bushoo qitiya bi mawiitoyich Yesuus waan hammiqqi, "Ta kexooch waaree, biiyati ta bushoon wodiibe!" iqqi qollahe.
Ebich Yesuusi "Mallatoonaa woriganikkiti mooyonon ittoshi beego qayi gaata, cir ittoshi mulloon ta toommooch too'iyaachotine" iye.
Taatee naayoo "Ta Doonocho! Ta bushoo qitaan beetee, hambone" iye.
Yesuusiyoo "Hambe! Ne bushoo woditone" iye. Uroo Yesuusichi qaaroon ibariiqqi hammiye.
Aroo hammii bi beetee, bi aafee bushiisheena'o gommoochaa biinna danaqqi, "Ne bushoo woditone" iyeete.
Biyoo "Ambicha saatoochiye ta bushoo wodito?" iqqi echahe. Boonoshiyoo "Yiich shabaatta saatoochiye bi achee gaamoo aqqato" iyeete.
Nihoo "Ne bushoo woditone" Yesuusi ito aree gaata bi tunoon shalligiye. Ebich biinnaa bi kechi asheena'o bullina boonoshi mulloon Yesuusichi toommooch too'iiheete.
Ebiyoo Yesuusi Yihudee Shawoochee Galiilee Shawooch wottaa waaqqi bi tuniiti guttinnee mallatoone.
qEbiyee gub, Ayihudeena'ochi baaroo bi tunatoyich Yesuusi Yerusalem hammiye.
Yerusalemi guudoona gayeeti gayoochee bageena'o giyii beeti kellee ga'ooch Hibiree noonoona Betesidi gettee beeti ikka kota aaco beehe; uucha bashee yambaaro bi guudoona beehe.
Eboshichi daggooch meeti biiyachina'o, aaf doogeena'o, baata yesheena'o, boonoshi ashittino qititina'oo qeyii beeheete.
Arooch shaashaa shimmitta naton biiyati ikka uro beehe.
Yesuusi hini qeyii beeti uroon ciinniqqi, and beddaahee wodda naton eechiqqi bi beemon ariiqqi, "Wodoon qaawii beetine?" iqqi echahe.
Biiyati uroo "Ta doonocho! Aaco shuuriyee, aacooch taan giijemmi asho aalloone; ta giya iyee, baroo tayee shiichii giyiye" iqqi wochiye.
Yesuusiyoo "Tiyi ne yeebboon qodi shaagiree hambe!" iye.
Bekkach aroochee uro wodiye; bi yeebboonoo qoddii shaaggiqqi hammiye. Ara aabo Shambatoone.
Ebich Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o woditi uroon "Hanaach Shambatoone; Shambatoona yeebboon qoddii shaagon no calloo daaggaanoone" iyeete.
Tunatee uro wochiqqi, "Taan wodiiti uro 'Ne yeebboon qodi shaagiree hambe!' iqqi taach gettitone" iye.
Boonoshiyoo " 'Ne yeebboon qodi shaagiree hambe!' iqqi neech gettiti uro aabine?" iqqi echaheete.
Tunaballi arooch beeti asho meeto bi tunatoyich, wotta Yesuusi asheena'ochi daggoona arichataanoon beshaa bi hammitoyich, woditi uro koni biin wodiito gaata ariyoon hakkaanoone.
Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi uroon Yaafee Kexoochaa danaqqi, "And wodito neene; ebiyee besha mooyo ne toommooch bi waataachemmoyich, ebiyee bek axaaxoon shuuniyaahine!" iye.
Uro hammiqqi Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'oyich "Taan wodiito Yesuusine" iqqi gettiye.
Ebich Shambatooba eboshin bi shuunatoyich, Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o Yesuusin du'ii beeheete.
Tunatee boonoshich Yesuusi "Ta Nihoo hanaach beddaahee shuunaa beetone; tawoo ta qelloona shuunaa beeto taane" iqqi gettiye.
Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o Shambatoon bi shaaddatoyich baach tunataanoon, bi qelloon Yeerina tachiqqi, "Yeeri ta Nihoone" bi itoyich, biin beshoon wuxiya qaawiyeete.

Ebich Yesuusi wochiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Nihoo Yeeri tunii beeto bullin bi Bushoo wotta biichoomon tunii beetone; ebich Nihoo Yeeri tuniitee bi beeggitonalli, Bushoo bi qelloona amoonolla shuunoon hakkaache.
Ebiyoo Nihoo Yeeri bi Bushoon shunnii bi beetoyichiye; wotta bi shuunaa beeto bullin biich bekkii bi beetoyichiye; ittoshiyoo ittoshi woriganemmoyich ebiyee besha shuunoon biich bekkiiyemmone.
Nihoo Yeeri qititina'on opoochee kichiqqi kashoon bi imoomon, ebiyoomon bi Bushoo wotta imma bi qaawitina'oyich kashoon immemmone.

Wotta Nihoo Yeeri ikka ashi toommoocholla nallaachemmone; asheena'o bulli Nihoo Yeerin boonoshi oogii beetoomon ebiyoomon bi Bushoon boonoshi oogiiyemmoyich, nalloo bullin bi Bushoyich immitone; ebich bi Bushoon oogiyaano biin deejiti bi Nihoo Yeerin oogiyaanoone.

"Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Ta qaaroon waayaa beeto, taanoo deejiti Yeerichi toommooch bi mulloon too'ii beeto, bulli yemeenee kashachone; qitoochee wodooch kimmitalli, nalloo bi toommooch kindaachemmone.
Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Qititina'o Yeerichi Bushoo qaaroon boonoshi waayemmi aabo woyemmone; ebiyoo andiye; waayammina'o kashoon danemmina'one.
Ebiyoo Nihoo Yeeri bi qelloona asheena'on kashacho bi tuniyoomon ebiyoomon wotta bi Bushoo asheena'on kashacho bi tuniiyemmoyich bi immitoyichiye.
Biyoo Ashi Bushoo bi tunatoyich, 'Nallibe' iqqi Nihoo Yeeri biin doonjiitone.

Qitii duukkatina'o bulli bi qaaroon boonoshi waayemmi aabo woyemmone; de'oon shuunatina'o kashoona boonoshi beeyemmoyich, gondoon shuunatina'oo boonoshi toommooch bi nalleeyemmoyich opoochee kechemmina'one. Ebich woriganiyaahotine!" iye.

Yesuusi daakkiqqi ishichiye:- "Ta, ta qelloona ikka mooyonolla tuniyoon hakkaano taane; Yeer waanee ta waayatoniye ta nallii beeto; ebich ta nalloo tatoone; Ebiyoo taan deejitochi daaggoonalli, ta daaggoon qaawaano ta qajatoyichiye.
"Ta wochiqqa ta qellichon ta miixa gaata, ta miixoon ibariiyemmo aalloone.
Taachon miixaa beeti baroo beetone; biyoo taachon miixaa bi beeti miixo ibaroo bi tunoon arii beeto taane.
"Ittoshiyoo Yowannis waan wochato ittoshine; biyoo taachon bi miixato ibaroone.
Ishichii ta ii beeto, ittoshi wodemmoyichalli, ta, ta qelloona ashi miixoon qaawaache.
Yowannisi micciibee aaxxaa beeti bekkoone; ittoshiyoo giishacha yemeenoon bi bekkoona emiriya shunnito ittoshine.
"Tunatee Yowannisi miixatoyee beshoon miixaa beeto taach beetone. Ebi ta tunii beeti shuunoo Nihoo Yeeri ta ciichemmoyich bi immitone. Biyoo Nihoo Yeeri taan bi deejoon taachon miixaa beetone.
Wotta taan wochati Nihoo Yeeri taachon miixatone; tunaballi bi qaaroon cir waayataano ittoshine; bi aafoonoo beegaano ittoshine.
Bi wochaton ittoshi ibariyoo qajitoyich, bi qaaro ittoshi mullooch aalloone.
Ittoshiyoo 'Yaafa Macaafeena'oochee bulli yemeenee kashoon danemmo noone' iibee, galliqqi boonoshi daggooch qaawiyotine; boonoshiyoo taachon miixaa beetina'one.
Tunaballi kashoon danoyich ta waan womoyich shunnaachotine.
"Ta, ta qelloona asho taan bi oogiiyemmoyich qaawaache.
Tunaballi Yeerin ittoshi mulloona ittoshi shunni qayon ariito taane.
Ta, ta Nihoochi yakkiracho tunaqqa bi waanee wocheeqqa waato taane; tunaballi ta yibbaatoon ibariyaachotine. Baroo waaqqi bi qellichon bi geti gaata, bi yibbaatoon ibariihotine.
Ittoshi, ittoshi qelli qelli oogoon daniya qaawiyotine; tunaballi bi ikketo tunati Yeer waanee danemmi oogoon qaawaachotine. Illa aabichiree taan ibariyoon hakkemmotine?
"Taan 'Nihoo Yeer waan hamiree noon taggemmone' getiree gabiyaahotine! Ittoshin taggemmo beetone; aroo ittoshi gibanaa beeti Muusine.
Aroo taachon kooritone; ebich biin ittoshi ibariito gaata, taan ibariiyesho ittoshine.
Bi kooriti Macaafeena'on ibariyaanoon ittoshi qajitoye, ta yibbaatoon aabichiree ibariiyehotine?" iye.
Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi Galiilee Baharoyee beqach kimmiye; biyoo Xibaaridoosee Baharoone.
Biiyachina'ochi toommooch bi bekkiiti woriganikkiti mallateena'on boonoshi beeggitoyich dofee asheena'o biin dabbiyeete.
Yesuusi gepooch kechiqqi arooch bi dabbeena'ona tookkii kotahe.
Ayihudeena'o baarii beeti Beshee Baaroo katinniye.
Yesuusi kaama wottaa bi ciinniyee, bi waan waa beeti dofee asheena'on beeggiye. Ebich Filipphoosin "Eboshi bulli maayemmi koshon amoochee kemehone?" iye.
Ishin bi gettito Filipphoosichi noonoochee waayoyichalli, amoon bi shuunemmo gaata arii beetone.
Filipphoosi "Boonoshi qelli qelloona giishi giishacheenolla boonoshi maa gaata, wodda balla birawoona kosho kematee boonoshich bedaache" iqqi wochiye.
Bi dabbeena'ochi daggoochee ikkoo, Simoon Pheexiroosichi manoo Indiriyaasi tiyiqqi,
"Uucha gishiishi xekee sheqee koshonaa gutta haashoonon yechiti bushoo hiniich beetone; tunaballi hinin shaaha asheena'oyich ebi amoon hallehe?" iye.
Yesuusi bi dabbeena'oyich "Asheena'on kotiibote!" iye. Ara xaa'oo mocachi gabini xaa'oone. Asheena'oo kotaheete; anaamina'ochi haddoo uucha hum bedoone.
Yesuusiyoo uucha xekee koshon tiijiqqi Yeerin gallatahe; arooch kotati asheena'oyichoo bechiye. Ebiyoomon wotta haashoocheenoo boonoshi qaawiti wottoon bechiye.
Asheena'o bulli maaqqi michitoyee gub, bi dabbeena'on "Duubiyaanoon gaawichiree echati ooyoon maci kicibote!" iye.
Ebina asheena'o maati Uucha sheqee koshoochee echati ooyoon kiciqqii aaraa gutta ogooga mokkoona ceechiyeete.
Arooch beeti asheena'o Yesuusi tuniiti mallatoon beeggiqqi, "Ibaroon hini uro 'Shawee toommooch woyemmone' getteeti keemachone" iyeete.
Ebichi naboona asheena'o bi waan waaree biin yeshi taatiiya boonoshi gaboon Yesuusi ariiqqi, boonoshi waanee bariqqi wochinnoon gepooch bi ikketo hammiye.
Shawoo xumahee, Yesuusichi dabbeena'o baharo beetooch hammiyeete;
marikabooch giyiqqi baharoyee beqach Qifirnaaha wottaqqi hammii beeheete. Aree gaata shawoo mandaroone. Yesuusi bat boonoshi waan waataan beetone.
Giidachi yongo yongatoyich, baharee aaco oogichii shuuriye.
Uucha oohee shiritta kiilee metiroon marikabee boojatoona yopaabee boonoshi hammitoyee gub, Yesuusi baharee aachi toommona sha'aabee marikabo waan bi katinee beeggiqqi keqqoona qitiyeete.
Tunaballi aroo "Taane; shattaahotine!" iye.
Ebina marikabooch bi giyemmoyich qaawiyeete. Bi giyitoyee gub bekkach marikaboona boonoshi hammii beeti shawooch shaggiyeete.

Dechara baharoyee haqach echati dofee asheena'o neexaa beeheete; boonoshiyoo bi dabbeena'o ikketo hamonalli Yesuusi boonoshina tookkii marikabooch bi gimi qayon, wotta arooch ikka marikaboyee damba bara marikabo aallo bi tunoon ariiheete.
Tunaballi [Doono gallatatee] koshon boonoshi maati xaa'ee ga'ooch beeti Xibaaridoosi Katamoochee bara marikabeena'ona hammiyeete.
Arooba asheena'o Yesuusinaa bi dabbeena'onon arooch muccaqqi tiyii marikabeena'ooch giyiqqi Yesuusin qaawoyich Qifirnaaha hammiyeete.
Asheena'o baharoyee beqach Qifirnaahaa Yesuusin danaqqi, "Dojachocho! Hiniich ne waato aatoobaniye?" iyeete.
Yesuusi wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Taan ittoshi qaawii beeto, koshon maaqqi ittoshi michitoyichalli, mallatoon ittoshi beeggitoyich toonoone.

Bulli yemeenee kashoon immemmi maayoyich shuunabotalli, aallemmi maayoyich shuuniyaahotine! Hini beshataani koshon ittoshich immemmo Ashi Bushoo taane; Ebiyoo Nihoo Yeeri taanna bi emiroon bi miixatoyichiye" iye.
Ebich asheena'o "Yeeri qaawii beeti shuunoon no shuunemmoyich aabichibona?" iqqi echaheete.
Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Yeeri qaawii beeti shuunoo, ittoshi mulloon bi wochaa deejitochi toommooch ittoshi too'iyooniye" iye.
Boonoshiyoo "Illa beegiree neen no ibariiyemmoyich, amee mallatoon bekkiiyenne? Amoon shuuna bekkiiyenne?
'Boonoshi maayemmoyich shimaayoochee koshon boonoshich immiye' getee bi kooreetoomon, no qaabbachina'o barahooch beebee 'mannoo' getteeti maayoon maatina'one" iyeete.
Yesuusiyoo "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye. Shimaayoochee ittoshich koshon immito, Muusi toonoone; tunaballi shimaayoochee ibara koshon ittoshich immii beeto Yeeri ta Nihoone.
Ebiyoo Yeeri immii beeti kosho, shimaayoochee kinddiqqi shawee toommooch beeti asheena'oyich kashoon immii bi beetoyichiye" iyee.
Ebich asheena'o "Doonocho! Hini koshon bulli aaboon nooch imbe!" iyeete.
Yesuusi ishichiqqi boonoshich wochiye:- "Kashee kosho taane; ta waan waa beeto cir shaacataachemmone; bi mulloon ta toommooch too'ii beeto, bulli yemeenoon cir shachawataachemmone.
Tunaballi ta ittoshich gettatoomon [taan] beeggito ittoshine; tunaballi ittoshi mulloon ta toommooch too'iyaachotine.

Shimaayoochee ta kindito, taan wochati Yeerichi daaggoon tuniyoyichalli, ta daaggoon tuniyoyich toonoone. Ebich ta Nihoo Yeeri taach immito bulli ta waan woyemmone; ta waan waammo bullin cir maaxooch kichi dufaachemmo taane.
Taan wochati ta Nihoo qaawii beeto, taach bi immitoochee ikkoonolla ta aalliyaachemmonaa ciireexi aabooba qitii bi duukkatoochee ta kichemmonoyichiye.

Yeerichi Bushoo taan ariiqqi bi mulloon ta toommooch too'ii beeto bulli, bulli yemeenee kashoon bi danemmoyich ta Nihoochi daaggoo ebine; tawoo ciireexi aabooba qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee biin kichemmo taane" iye.
Arooba Yesuusi "Shimaayoochee kinditi kosho taane" bi itoyich, Ayihudeena'o bi toommooch guruuxeebee,
"Hini bi nihoonaa bi indeenon no arii beeti Yooseefichi bushoo Yesuusi toona? Ishi gaata, aabichiqqi 'Shimaayoochee kindito taane' iye?" iyeete.
Yesuusi tiyiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ittoshinaa ittoshina xuuqqisheyaahotine!
Taan wochati Nihoo Yeeri yeepphitoyee beshatee, ta waan womon hakkemmo koniyolla aalloone; tawoo ciireexi aabooba qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee biin kichemmo taane.
'Boonoshi bulli Yeer waanee ariitina'o tunemmina'one' getee Keemachina'ochi Macaafooch kooreetone. Illa Nihoo Yeer waanee waayaqqi arii beeto bulli ta waan woyemmone.
Yeer waanee kinditoyee damba, Nihoo Yeerin beeggito koniyolla aalloone; bi ikketo baachiye Nihoo Yeerin beeggito.
Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Bi mulloon ta toommooch too'ii beeto, bulli yemeenee kashachone.
Kashee kosho taane.
Ittoshi qaabbachina'o barahooch beebee 'mannoo' getteeti maayoon maatina'one; tunaballi qititina'one.
Hini ta gettaa beeti kosho shimaayoochee kinditone; aroochee maammo koniyolla qitaachemmone.

Shimaayoochee kinditi bulli yemeenee kashee kosho taane. Asho hini koshoochee bi maa gaata, bulli yemeenoon beeyemmone. Shawee toommooch beetina'o kashoon boonoshi danemmoyich ta immemmi kosho ta meenone" iye.
Ebich Ayihudeena'o "Hini uro bi meenon aabichiree nooch maanjoon hakkehe?" iqqi boonoshinaa boonoshina hayaheete.
Ebich Yesuusi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Ashi Bushoo ta meenon ittoshi mamo qayi gaata, ta damoonoo ittoshi uyo qayi gaata, ittoshi qelloona kasho ittoshich aalloone.

Ta meeno ibara maayo, ta damoo ibara uyo bi tunatoyich, ta meenon maa beeto, ta damoonoo uchii beeto, bulli yemeenee kashachone; tawoo ciireexi aabooba qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee biin kichemmo taane.
Ta meenon maa beeto, ta damoonoo uchii beeto taanna tookkii beetone; tawoo biinna tookkii beeto taane.
Beeyachi Nihoo Yeeri taan wochatone; tawoo bi naboona beeyacho taane. Ebiyoomon taan maa beeto, ta naboona kashacho tunaree beeyemmone.
Illa shimaayoochee kinditi kosho ebine; ittoshi qaabbachina'o ara koshon maaqqi boonoshi qititoomon toonoone. Hini koshon maa beeto, bulli yemeenoon beeyemmone" iye.
Qifirnaaha beeti Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kexoochaa ishichiqqi dojii beehe.
Yesuusin dabbitina'oochee meetina'o ishin waayaqqi, "Hini ashoon giirii beeti yibbaatoone; hinin waayoon hakkemmo konine?" iyeete.
Tunatee Yesuusi biin dabbitina'o ebi mooyoyich boonoshi guruuxoon bi mulloona ariiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ebi ittoshich xugoona?
Illa Ashi Bushoo ta, aaf ta waati xaa'ooch wottaree ta keyee ittoshi beegi gaata, ama gettehotine?
Kashoon immii beeto Yeerichi Ayaanoone; ashi giidoo amoonolla hallaache. Ta ittoshich gettati qaaro ayaanoonaa kashoonaniye.

Tunaballi ittoshi daggoochee ebin ibariyaaneena'o beetina'one" iye. Yesuusi bi ishichito, boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iyaaneena'o aaboshi gaata, biin beshiiree immemmo aabi gaata, shiichiqqi bi arii beetoyichiye.
Daakkiqqi ishichiye:- "Ebich ishichiyoye:- 'Nihoo Yeeri biich hakkoon imaan gaata, ta waan womon hakkemmo aalloone' " iye.
Ebichi naboona biin dabbitina'ochi daggoochee meetina'o gub wottaheete; aroyee gub biin dabbaaneena'one.
Ebich Yesuusi aaraa gutta bi dabbeena'oyich "Ittoshi wotta hamma qaawii beetotina?" iye.
Simoon Pheexiroosi wochiqqi, "Ta Doonocho! Koni waaniye no hammeho? Bulli yemeenee kashee qaaro ne waaniye bi beeto.
Noo, Yeerichi Yaafoo ne tunoon ibariito noone; ariinoo ito noone" iye.
Yesuusi boonoshich "Ta, aaraa guttoo ittoshin kaacaachota? Tunatee ittoshi daggeexi ikkoo Daabiloosine" iqqi wochiye.
Bi gettito, Asqorootachi Simoonichi bushoo Yihudichoniye; Ebiyoo aaraa gutta bi dabbeena'ochi daggoochee ikkoo tunato biin beshiiree immemmo bi tunatoyichiye.
Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o biin wuxiya boonoshi qaawii beetoyich, Yihudee Shawoona sha'oon shunnaanoone; ebich Galiilee Shawoona sha'aa beehe.
Ayihudeena'ochi Bashee Yambaaree Baaroo katinnii giishacha aabo echahe.
Ebich Yesuusichi maneena'o biich "Ne tunii beeti mooyon neen dabbii beetina'o boonoshi beeggemmoyich, hiniichee tiyiree Yihudee Shawooch hambe!
Bi qelloon arichiyoo qaawii beeti asho aashoona shuunataanoone. Hini mooyina'on ne tunii beeto bullich, ne qelloon shawee toommooch beetina'o bullich arichiibe!" iyeete.
Bi maneena'o boonoshi ishichito, boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iyoo boonoshi qajitoyichiye.
Yesuusi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Arooch ta hammemmi aabo battiye; tunaballi amee aabolla bi tunatee, ittoshich kaamoone.
Yeerich de'a getaani hini shawee toommeexi asheena'o ittoshin boonoshi shixxemmi naboo aalloone; tunatee boonoshi shuunoo gondo bi tunoon ta miixaa beetoyich, taan shixxiyeete.
Ittoshi hini baarooch hambote! Ta hammemmi aabo battiye. Ebich hini baarooch and hamaache" iye.
Ishichiqqi boonoshich gettiichii Galiilee Shawooch echahe.
Tunaballi bi maneena'o baarooch boonoshi hammitoyee gub, Yesuusi wotta xalla bekkataanoon aashoona ara baarooch hammiye.
Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o "aroo aaye?" iibee ara baaree xaa'oochaa qaawii beeheete.

Dofee asheena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o bi toommooch oogichii guruuxii beeheete. Ikkikkeena'o "Gaawa uroone" iyeete; tunaballi bareena'o wotta "Gaawataanoone; asheena'on muricii beetone" ii beeheete.
Tunatee Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'on boonoshi shattitoyich, koniyolla biichon xalla kichii yibbaatataanoone.
Baaree shabaattee daggooch Yesuusi Yaafee Kexooch hammiqqi asheena'oyich dojooch giyiye.
Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o "Asho biich dojaanoon, hini uro eboshi bullin aabichiqqi ariihe?" iqqi woriganaa beeheete.
Ebich Yesuusi tiyiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ta dojii beeti mooyo taan wochato waaneenalli ta waanee toonoone.
Koniyolla Yeeri shunniton tuniyoyich bi qaawi gaata, aroo hini ta dojii beeto Yeer waanee bi tunoon oohee ta, ta qelloona ta geton ariiyemmone.
Bi qellee gaboona gettii beeto, ashi waanee oogoon qaawii beeti uroone; tunatee biin wochaton oogiiya qaawii beeto, aroo ibara moochachone; xummittino bi mullooch aalloone.
Muusi Yeerichi calloon ittoshich imaacha? Tunaballi ittoshi daggoochee ara calloon quyaa beeto ikkolla aalloone. Taan wuxoyich akkiya qaawii beetotine?" iye.
Asheena'o wochiqqi, "Yinno ne toommooch beetone. Konine neen wuxoyich qaawii beeto?" iyeete.
Yesuusi wochiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ikka shuunoon shuunahoye; ittoshi bulli aroon woriganahotine.

Ittoshich, Shambatooba bushiishoon dokirii beeto ittoshine. Ebiyoo Muusi dokiriyee doyoon ittoshich bi immitoyichiye; tunatee hini doyoon ittoshich immitina'o, ittoshi qaabbachina'oalli Muusi toonoone.
Muusichi calloon quyoyich ittoshi bushiishoon Shambatooba dokirii beeto ittoshi tuna gaata, ashoon ceeni bi ashittinoon Shambatooba ta wodiitoyich, amoyich taan kaarahotine?
Kaachiree nallibotalli shafoona nalliyaahotine!" iye.
Arooba Yerusalemee asheena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o ishichiyeete:- "No ukkureena'o wuxiya boonoshi qaawii beeto, hini uroon toona?
Ebiyoche! Kaacha gettii beehe amoone! Boonoshiyoo amoonolla getaacheete amoone! Ibaroon ukkureena'o hini uro Kiristoosi bi tunoon ariiqqi tuneha?
Tunaballi hini amoochee gaata ariito noone; tunatee Kiristoosi waahooba, bi woyemmo amoochee gaata koniyolla ariyaachemmone" iyeete.

Ebich Yesuusi Yaafee Kexoochaa dojiibee bi qaaroon oogichiqqi ishichiye:- "Taanoo arii beeto ittoshine; amoochee ta waato gaata arii beeto ittoshine. Ta, ta qelloona waataano taane; tunaballi taan wochato gibaneetone; ittoshi biin ariyaano ittoshine;
Tunatee ta bi waanee waato taane; biyoo taan wochatone; ebich biin arii beeto taane" iye.
Ebich asheena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o biin yecha qaawii beeheete; tunatee bi yecheeyemmi aabo bat shago bi qajitoyich koniyolla biin yeshaanoone.
Tunatee asheena'ochi daggoochee meetina'o boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iiqqi, "Kiristoosi waahooba, hini Yesuusi bekkiiti mallateena'oyee beshoon bekkiiyeha?" iyeete.

Asheena'o Yesuusichi mooyon tiijii ishichiqqi boonoshi guruuxee beetee, Fariseena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o waayaheete. Ebich qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'o, Fariseena'oo biin yechiiya Yaafee Kechi qoomeena'on wochaheete.
Yesuusiyoo "Bat giishacha aaboon ittoshina tookki kotemmo taane; aroochee taan wochato waan hammemmo taane.
Ittoshiyoo taan qaawemmo ittoshine; tunaballi danataachemmo ittoshine; ta beetoochoo womon hakkaachotine" iye.

Ebich Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o boonoshinaa boonoshina "No biin danataachemmoyich, hini uro amooch hammaniye bi ii beeto? No asheena'o shacaqqi beeti Giriikkeena'ochi gafeena'ooch hamiree Giriikkee asheena'oyich arichiyoyich tuneha?
Biyoo 'Taan qaawemmo ittoshine; tunaballi danataachemmo ittoshine; ta beetoochoo womon hakkaachemmo ittoshine' bi ii beeti hini bi yibbaatoo amoone?" iqqi yibbaataheete.
Baaree ciiroochee qaabba aabooba Yesuusi neexaa bi qaaroon oogichiqqi, "Koniyolla shachawato bi bee gaata, ta waan waaree uye.
Bi mulloon ta toommooch too'ii beeto, Yaafa Macaafoochaa bi getteetoomon, 'Kashee aachi tunoo bi maacoochee xuupphemmone' "iye.

Ishin bi gettito, boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iitina'o bat boonoshi danemmi Yaafa Ayaaneechoniye; ebiyoo Yesuusi oogoyich bat shimaaj keyaan bi beetoyich, Yaafa Ayaano kindaano bi tunatoyichiye.
Ebich dofee asheena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o hini bi yibbaatoon waayaqqi, "Ibaroon hini uro quyaa no beeti keemachone" iyeete.
Bareena'o "Hini uro Kiristoosine" iyeete. Tunatee bareena'o "Kiristoosi Galiilee Shawoochee waataachemmone.
Yaafa Macaafoochaa 'Kiristoosi Taatoo Daawiti yaroochee, Daawiti dicciti katamoo Betelemee kechemmone' getteyaacha?" iyeete.
Ebich Yesuusichi naboona asheena'ochi daggooch shaaco tunahe;
Boonoshi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o biin yecha qaawiyeete; tunaballi koniyolla yeshon hakkaanoone.
Yaafee Kechi qoomeena'o wottaqqi qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa Fariseena'ona waan boonoshi waahee, "Amoyich yechiqqi deebaachotine?" iyeete.
Qoomeena'oo "Hini uroochoomon koniyolla yibbaatatee beeggaa ariyaano noone" iqqi wochiyeete.
Ebich Fariseena'o "Ittoshi wotta dacheetotina?
Ayihudee nallachina'o oohee Fariseena'ochi daggoochee ikkolla bi waan wottato beeta?
Tunaballi Muusichi calloon ariyaani hini asho Yeerina upatone" iqqi wochiyeete.
Arooch beeti Fariseena'ochi daggoochee ikkoo xumoona shiichiqqi Yesuus waan waati Niqoodimoosi
"Nallacho shiichiqqi taggeetochi noonoochee waayataanoon, amoon bi shuunato gaata ariyaanoon, ashi toommooch bi nallemmoyich no calloo daaggiita?" iqqi echahe.
Boonoshiyoo wochiqqi, "Newoo wotta Galiilacho neena? Keemacho Galiilee Shawoochee keyaachemmone. Yaafa Macaafoochee qaawiree beege!" iyeete.
[ebiyee gub, boonoshi kexi kexooch hammiyeete.
Aroochee Yesuusi Zayitee Michi Guudooch hammiye.
Haree maaddoona wotta Yaafee Kechi kakallee daggooch wottaqqi hammiye. Asheena'o bulli bi waan waaheete. Kotaqqinoo boonoshich dojiye.
Dojii bi beetee, Muusichi callee dojachina'onaa Fariseena'ona shunoon maabee yechati ureen bi waan deebiyeete; boonoshi daggooch biin neechiqqi,
Yesuusin "Dojachocho! Hini ure shunoon maabee danaqqa yechatine.
Muusiyoo bi calloochaa ebiyoomina'on 'Xaqqoona yexi wuxibote!' iqqi gettitone. Newochi ama gettenne?" iyeete.
Ishichii boonoshi ito, bi toommoochee mooyon danaree biin taggiya boonoshi qaawitoyichiye. Tunaballi Yesuusi yittiqqi bi yapharoona (yabaroona) shawee toommooch kooriye.
Wochii wochiqqi biin boonoshi echahona, kaamaqqi, "Ittoshi daggoochee axaaxaallo xaqqoona shiichi biin yexe" iye.
Wotta yittiqqi bi yapharoona (yabaroona) shawee toommooch kooriye.
Boonoshiyoo ishin waayaqqi geeneena'oochee tiijiqqi ikki iqqaabee bulli kechiyeete. Yesuusi arooch bi ikketo echahe; ureyoo daggooch neexaa beehan.
Yesuusi kaamaqqi ureen "Haane! Neen taggatina'o aayeete? Ne toommooch nallito aalla?" iqqi echahe.
Ureyoo "Ta Doonocho! Koniyolla aalloone" iyan. Yesuusiyoo "Tawo wotta ne toommooch nallaache. Hambe! Ebiyee damba guttinnoon axaaxoon shuuniyaahine!" iye.]
Wotta Yesuusi asheena'oyich "Tawoo shawee toommooch beeti ashich bekko taane; taan dabbiyoyich kashoon immemmi bekko bekkehalli, cir mandaroona sha'ataachemmone" iqqi gettiye.
Ebich Fariseena'o "Ne, ne qellichon miixahine; ne miixo ibaroo toonoone" iyeete.

Yesuusi wochiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ta, ta qellichon amoonolla ta miixatee, amoochee ta waato gaata, amooch ta hammemmo gaata arii beeto taane; ebich ta miixo gibaneetone. Tunatee ittoshi amoochee ta waato gaata, amooch ta hammemmo gaata ariyaachotine.
Ittoshich shaahiton nalliyotine; ta, ta qelloona konichi toommoocholla nallaache.
Taan wochati Nihoo Yeeri taanna tookkiinalli ta ikketo toono taane; ebich ta nalli gaata, ta nalloo ibaroone.
Ittoshi callee daggooch wotta 'Gutta asheena'o miixammi miixo manjoone' getee kooreetone.
Ta, ta qellichon miixaa beeto taane; wotta taan deejiti Nihoo Yeeri taachon miixaa beetone" iye.
Ebich boonoshi "Ne nihoo aabiichiye?" iqqi echaheete. Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Taan, oohee ta Nihoon ariyaachotine. Taan ittoshi ariito gaata, ta Nihoon wotta ariiyesho ittoshine" iye.
Yesuusi eboshi bullin bi gettito, Yaafee Kexooch beeti gija kicee qiicee ga'oochaa dojiibeeniye. Tunaballi bi yecheeyemmi aabo shagaano bi tunatoyich, koniyolla biin yeshaanoone.
Yesuusi wochinnoon boonoshich "Ta hammemmo taane. Taanoo qaawemmo ittoshine; tunatee ittoshi axaaxoona qitemmo ittoshine. Ebich ta hammaa beetooch hamon hakkaachemmo ittoshine" iye.
Ebich Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o boonoshinaa boonoshina " 'Ta hammaa beetooch hamon hakkaachotine' bi ii beeto, amoyichiye? Bi kishoona qitiya tuneha?" iyeete.
Yesuusi "Ittoshi hiniixo ittoshine; tunaballi ta damba shimaayeexo taane. Ittoshi hini shaweexo ittoshine; ta hini shaweexo toono taane.
Ebich ittoshich 'Ittoshi axaaxoona qitemmo ittoshine' iyoye; 'Amoyicha?' bi gettee gaata, ta koni ta gaata ta tunoon ariiqqi ittoshi ibariyoo qayi gaata, ittoshi axaaxoona qitemmo ittoshine" iye.
Boonoshiyoo "Ne koni neene?" iqqi echaheete. Yesuusiyoo "Shiichii ittoshich ta gettatoomon taane.
Ittoshich ta gettemmo, ittoshi toommoochoo ta nallemmi wodda mooyo beetone; tunatee taan deejito ibara moochachone; tawoo bi waanee ta waayaton hini shawooch beeti ittoshich gettahoye" iye.
Arooba waayati asheena'o Nihoo Yeerichon boonoshich bi geton shalligaaneena'one.

Ebich Yesuusi boonoshich "Ashi Bushoo taan kichii ittoshi yoodiyooba, beeyacho ta tunoon, wotta ta gettaa beeto ta Nihoo gettiton baachalli, ta qelloona amoonolla ta tuniyee qayon arooba ariiyemmo ittoshine.
Taan deejito taanna tookkiiniye bi beeto; biin emirikkii beeton bulli araddoon ta tunii beetoyich, ta ikketon dufaanoone" iye.
Ebin bi getee, waayatina'ochi daggoochee meetina'o boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iiheete.
Yesuusiyoo boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iiti Ayihudeena'on "Ittoshi ta qaaroon ceechii ittoshi bee gaata, ibaroon ta dabboo ittoshine;
ibaroonoo ariiyemmo ittoshine; ibaroo guuchittinoochee ittoshin kichemmone" iye.
Boonoshiyoo wochiqqi, "Abrahamichi yaroo noone; konicholla cir guuno tunataano noone. 'Guuchittinoochee kechemmo ittoshine' iqqa aabichiqqa noon gettanne?" iyeete.
Yesuusi ishichiqqi boonoshich wochiye:- "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Axaaxoon shuunaa beeto bulli axaaxee guunone.
Guuno magi bushoo tuno bi qajitoyich, bulli araddoon tookki beetaachemmone; tunaballi magi bushoo bulli araddoon tookki beeyemmone.
Illa magi bushoo ittoshin guuchittinoochee bi kichi gaata, ibaroon guuchittinoochee kechemmo ittoshine.
Abrahamichi yaroo ittoshi tunoon arii beeto taane; tunaballi ta gettati qaaroon ibariyoo ittoshi qajitoyich, taan wuxoyich qaawiyotine.
Ta, ta Nihoo taach bekkiiton gettahoye; ittoshiyoo wotta ittoshi nihoo waanee ittoshi waayaton tuniihotine" iye.
Boonoshiyoo wochiqqi, "No nihoo Abrahamine" iyeete. Yesuusiyoo "Abrahamichi bushiishoo ittoshi tunato gaata, Abrahami shuunatoomon shuunesho ittoshine.
Andoo Yeer waanee ta waayati ibaroon ittoshich gettato taane; tunaballi taan wuxiya qaawiyotine. Abrahami ebiyoomon shuunataanoone.
Ittoshi, ittoshi nihoo shuunatoomon shuunaa beeto ittoshine" iye. Boonoshiyoo "No arichataani nihoona shiijataano noone. Ikka Nihoo baachiye nooch beeto; aroo Yeerine" iyeete.
Yesuusiyoo boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ta Yeer waaneeniye ta waato. Ebich Yeeri ittoshi Nihoo gaata, taan shunnesho ittoshine. Bi taan wochateenalli, ta, ta aalloona (ta qellee daaggoona) waataano taane.
Ta qaaroon waayo ittoshi qajitoyichiye ta gettaa beeton ittoshi shalligoo qajito.

Ittoshiyo, ittoshi nihoo Daabiloosichi bushiishoo ittoshine; ittoshi nihoochi qaatoon ceechoon shunniyotine. Biyoo shiichiqqi kashee kichachone; ibaroo bi maacooch bi aallatoyich, ibaree gommooch neexataanoone. Biyoo kootacho, kooto bullichi nihoone; ebich kootoon bi gettii bee gaata, bi mullooch beeton gettiye.
Tunatee ta ibaroon gettaa beeto ta tunatoyich, taan ibariyaachotine.
Ittoshi daggoochee taan 'Axaaxoon shuunato neene' gettemmo aabine? Ibaroon gettaa beeto ta tuna gaata, ittoshiyochi amoyich taan ibariyaachotine?
Yeericho tunato, Yeerichi qaaroon waayahe; tunaballi Yeericho ittoshi tuno qajitoyich, bi qaaroon waayataachotine" iye.
Ayihudeena'o wochiqqi, " 'Shamaaracho neene; yinnoo ne toommooch beetone' no ii beeto tato toona?" iyeete.
Yesuusiyoo ishichiqqi wochiye:- "Ta toommooch yinno aalloone; ta Nihoon oogii beeto taane; tunaballi ittoshi taan giishiihotine.
Tunatee ta 'Asho taan oogiibe' getaache; taan oogiiya qaawii beeto beetone; aroo taach nallii beetone.
Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Ta gettaa beeton ceechii beeto koniyolla bi bee gaata, bulli yemeenoon qitaachemmone" iye.

Ayihudeena'o "And ne toommooch yinno beemon xiishii ariito noone. Abrahami qititone; wotta keemachina'oo qititina'one. Tunatee ne 'Ta gettaa beeton ceechii beeto koniyolla bi bee gaata, bulli yemeenoon qitaachemmone' ii beetine.
Ibaroon ne no nihoo Abrahamiyee beshenne? Bi qititone; keemachina'o wotta qititina'one; ne koni taane iiniye ne beeto?" iyeete.
Yesuusi ishichiqqi boonoshich wochiye:- "Ta, ta qelloon ta oogii gaata ta oogo duuboone. Taan oogii beeto, ittoshi 'No Nuggushoone' ii beeti ta Nihoone.
Biin ariyaano ittoshine; tunatee ta arii beeto taane. 'Biin ariyaano taane' ta geti gaata, ittoshichoomon kootacho tunesho taane; tunaballi biin arii beeto taane; bi gettitonoo ceechii beeto taane.
Ittoshi nihoo Abrahami ta woyemmi aaboon bi beeggitoyich oogichii emiriye; beeggiqqinoo emiroona wucwucciye" iye.
Ayihudeena'oo "Bat aacha nat bedaachine. Abrahamin amoochaa beegganne?" iyeete.
Yesuusiyoo "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; Abrahami shiijataan beehooba, ta beeto taane" iye.
Ebich biin xaqqoona yexiree wuxiya iqqi xaqqoon tiijiyeete. Tunatee Yesuusi boonoshich tuusheehe; Yaafee Kexoocheenoo kechiqqi hammiye.
Yesuusi gommona hammiibee, aaf doogo tunaqqi shiijati uroon beeggiye.
Yesuusichi dabbeena'o "Dojachocho! Hini uro aaf doogo tunaqqi bi shiijato, koni axaaxoon shuunateenaniye? Biinnashi oohee biin shiyitina'one?" iqqi echaheete.
Yesuusiyoo ishichiqqi wochiye:- "Hini uro aaf doogo tunaqqi bi shiijato, Yeerichi shuunoo biinna bi bekkemmoyichalli, bi oohee biin shiyitina'o axaaxoon shuunatoyich toonoone.
Bekka beetee, taan wochati Yeerichi shuunoon tuniyoo nooch qaawiihe; koniyolla shuunoon hakkaachemmi mandaroo woyemmone.
Shawee toommooch ta beemmi wottoon, shawee toommooch beetina'oyich bekko taane" iye.
Ishichiqqi tiyii shawooch cuddiqqi bi dengiiti dengoon aaf doogoochi aafooch huuttiye.
Aroochee uroon "Hamiree Saloomi gettee beeti kota aacoochaa ne aafoon machabe!" iye. Saloomi geto "Wocheeto" getone. Ebich uro hammiqqi machahe; aroochee bi aafo ciinee wottaqqi bi kexooch hammiye.
Arooba bi giyeena'onaa aaf goommooch kotaqqi bi qollaa beetee beeggitina'ona "Hini uro gommooch kotaqqi gijoon qollaa beeti uro toona?" iyeete.
Ikkikkeena'o "Biine" iyeete; tunatee bareena'o "Biin shaahiyalli, bi toonoone" iyeete. Biyoo "Taane" iye.
"Ishi gaata, ne aafo aabichiqqi ciinniye?" iyeete.

Biyoo wochiqqi, "Yesuusi gettee beeti uro dengoon dengiiqqi ta aafooch huuttiichii, 'Hamiree Saloomi gettee beeti kota aacoochaa ne aafoon machabe!' iye. Ebina hammaa ta machatee, ta aafo ciinniye" iye.
Asheena'o "Ara urochi aaye?" iyeete. "Ta ariyaache" iye.
Asheena'o aaf doogo tunaqqi beebee echati uroon yechiqqi Fariseena'o waan daammiyeete.
Yesuusi dengoon dengiiqqi dengoona huuttiqqi bi aafoon bi ciinniiti aabo Shambatoone.
Ebich Fariseena'o wotta bara asheena'ochoomon aabichiqqi bi ciinnito gaata echaheete. Biyoo "aroo ta aafooch dengoon huuttiye; aacona machaho; andoo ta aafo ciinnii beetone" iye.

Fariseena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o "Hini uro Shambatoon oogiyaache; ebich Yeer waanee waato toonoone" iyeete. Tunatee bareena'o "Axaaxachi uro ebiyoomon mallateena'on aabichiree tuniyoon hakkehe?" iyeete. Boonoshi daggooch shaco giyiye.
Ebich Fariseena'o wochiqqi uroon "Ne aafoon ciinniiti uroochon ama gettenne?" iyeete. Biyoo "Keemachone" iye.
Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o bi nihoonaa bi indeenon boonoshi ceeggimmi wottoon, and ciinnii beeti uro aaf doogo tunaqqi beebee echato bi tunoon ibariyaaneena'one.
Boonoshinoo "Hini ittoshi bushoona? 'Aaf doogo tunaqqi shiijate' ittoshi ii beetona? Andochi aabichiqqi ciinniye?" iqqi echaheete.
Bi nihoonaa bi indeena wochiqqi, "Hini no bushoone; aaf doogo tunaqqi bi shiijoon arii beeto noone;
Tunaballi and aabichiqqi bi ciinnito gaata, wotta bi aafoon koni ciinniito gaata ariyaano noone. Biin echabote! Aroo ooga uroone; aroo bi qellichon geton mawiyaachemmone" iyeete.

Biin shiyitina'o ishichii boonoshi ito, Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'on boonoshi shattitoyichiye. Ebiyoo Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o "Yesuusi aroo Kiristoosine" iqqi miixammo bi dana gaata, aroon Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kexoochee boonoshi yookkemmoyich echee boonoshi itoyichiye.
Ebich biin shiyitina'o "Aroo ooga uroone; biin echabote!" iyeete.
Ebich aaf doogo tunaqqi beebee and ciinniti uroon wochinnoon ceeggiqqi, "Yeericha getiree ibaroon yibbaatabe! Hini uro axaaxacho bi tunoon no arii beeto noone" iyeete.
Biyoo wochiqqi, "Axaaxacho tunabe, tunaaye ta ariyaache. ebiyee aaf, aaf doogo ta tunoon, tunaballi and ta ciinon ebi ikka mooyon baach ariihoye" iye.
Boonoshiyoo daakkiqqi, "Neech amoon halliye? Aabichiqqi ne aafoon ciinniihe?" iyeete.
Biyoo wochiqqi, "Shiichiqqa ittoshich gettato taane; ittoshi waayataachotine; amoon halliya wochinnoon waayoyich qaawii beetotine? Ittoshiyoo wotta biin dabbiya qaawii beetotina?" iye.
Boonoshiyoo biin naaggiibee, "Ne bi dabboo neene; tunatee no Muusichi dabboo noone.
Yeeri Muusich bi geton no arii beeto noone; tunaballi hini uro amoochee bi waato gaatolla ariyaano noone" iyeete.
Uroo ishichiqqi wochiye:- "Amoochee bi waato gaata ittoshi ariyee qayo woriganikkiti mooyone; tunaballi bi ta aafoon ciinniitone.
Yeerin shattii beeto, bi daaggoonoo tunii beetochi qolloon Yeeri waayahalli, axaaxoon shuunaa beeti asheena'ochi qolloon bi waayee qayon arii beeto noone.
Yeeri shawoonaa shimaayoonon bi hallitoochee tiijiqqi, koniyolla 'Aaf doogo tunaqqi shiijati uroochi aafoon ciinniitone' getee waayeyaanoone.
Hini uro Yeer waanee bi tunataan gaata, amoonolla tuniyoon hakkaacheshone" iye.
Boonoshiyoo wochiqqi, "Hini axaaxoona qoqqaanneeqqa shiijatocho! Nooch dojiya qaawii beetine?" iyeete. Aroochee Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kexoochee biin kichiyeete.
Yesuusiyoo bi wodiiti aaf dooga uroon Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kexoochee boonoshi kichoon waayahe. Biin qaawii danaqqi, "Ne mulloon Ashi Bushoochi toommooch too'iiyenne?" iqqi echahe.
Biyoo wochiqqi, "Ta doonocho! Ta mulloon bi toommooch ta too'iiyemmi uro bi qelloona aaye?" iye.
Yesuusiyoo "Biin beeggato neene. Andoo neenna tookkii yibbaataa beeto aroo taane" iye.
Biyoo "Ta Doonocho! Ta mulloon ne toommooch too'iito taane" iqqi biich yittii goyinnahe.
Yesuusiyoo "Ciinaaneena'o ciinee, ciinnii beetina'o doogee, nalloona boonoshi baribaremmoyich, ta hini shawooch waato taane" iye.
Biinna tookkii arooch beetina'ochi daggoochee ikkikka Fariseena'o ishin waayaqqi, "No wotta aaf doogo noona?" iqqi echaheete.
Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Aaf doogo ittoshi tunato gaata, gondo ittoshi toommoochee danataacheshone. Tunaballi and 'Ciinnaa beeto noone' iyotine; ebich ittoshi toommooch beeti gondo wohaachemmone" iye.
"Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- bageena'ochi maggooch maggee kelloona giyaano, bara gommona capphiqqi giyiyo, aroo gaayoonaa bokkoonaniye.
Tunatee kelloona giyiyoo bageena'ochi qiddoone.
Biich kellacho qechemmone. Bageena'oo bi qaaroon waayemmina'one; bi bageena'on boonoshi shigi shigoona ceegiree kichemmone.
Bi bageena'o bullin bi kichitoyee gub boonoshi aafooch shiichemmone; bi bageena'oo bi qaaroon boonoshi arii beetoyich, biin dabbemmina'one.
Tunaballi baroo waanee xuuppheheetalli biin dabbaachemmina'one; Ebiyoo baroochi qaaroon ariyaano boonoshi qajitoyichiye" iye.
Yesuusi ishin arooch beeti asheena'oyich shaahiyoona gettiye; tunatee bi gettito ama geto gaata boonoshich giyaanoone.
Ebich Yesuusi daakkiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Ta, bageena'ochi kello taane.
[Taye aaf] waatina'o bulli gaayeena'onaa bokkeena'onaniye; tunatee bageena'o boonoshi qaaroon waayataaneena'one.
Kello taane. Taanna giyiyoo koninolla wodiiyemmo taane. Giijemmo taane; kichemmo taane; quya maanjemmo taane.
Gaayo bi waa beeto gaayoyich, guuroonaa aalliyoonoyichalli, baroon halloyich toonoone; tunaballi ta waato, kashoon boonoshi danemmoyich, ebiyoo ceeni kashoon boonoshi danemmoyichiye.
"De'a qiddoo taane. De'a qiddoo bi bageena'o keroyich qitemmone.
Tunaballi gijoon deqqiqqi qiddaa beeto biicho tunati bagee qiddoo tuno bi qajitoyich, okaroo waa gaata bageena'on dufiichi woccemmone; arooba okaroo bageena'on yechemmone; boonoshinoo shaccemmone.
Ara qiddoo bi woccito, gijoon deqqiqqi qiddaa beeto bi tunatoyichiye; bageena'oyichoo maaxo bi qajitoyichiye.
"De'a qiddoo taane. Nihoo Yeeri taan bi arii beetoomon, tawoo Nihoo Yeerin ta arii beetoomon ta bageena'on arii beeto taane; boonoshiyoo taan arii beetina'one; boonoshi keroyichoo qitemmo taane.
Hini maggooch giyaani bara bageena'o taach beetina'one. Boonoshinoo wotta deebo taach qaawiihe; ta qaaroonoo waayemmina'one; ikka qiddoo boonoshin ikkochiree quyemmone.
"Qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee wochinnoon ta kechemmoyich, ta daaggoona qitemmo taane; ebich Nihoo Yeeri taan shunnii beetone.
Ta shunniree qitehoalli, ta shunnaanoon taan wuxemmo aalloone. Qitoonaa qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee keyonoyich hakkoo taach beetone; ta Nihoo 'Ebin tuniibe!' itone" iye.
Arooba hini yibbaatee naboona Ayihudeena'ochi daggooch wochinnoon shaco giyiye.
Boonoshi daggoochee meetina'o "Yinnachone! Geyatone! Amoyich bi yibbaatoon waayaa beetotine?" iyeete.
Bareena'o "Bi yibbaatoo yinnachi ashi yibbaatoomo toonoone. Yinno aaf doogeena'ochi aafoon ciinniyoon hakkeha?" iyeete.
Yerusalem beeti yaafee kexon Yeerich boonoshi diirii beeti baaroo katinniye. Shawoo yooyone.
Yesuusi Yaafee Kechi kakallooch Solomoonichi genja gaaddaafoona sha'aa beehe.
Ikkikka Ayihudeena'o biin giichii guuddiqqi, "Aati wottoon nooch aachenne? Ne Kiristoosi ne gaata, kaacha nooch gete!" iyeete.
Yesuusiyoo ishichiqqi boonoshich wochiye:- "Ta ittoshich gettato taane; tunaballi ibariyaachotine. Ta, ta nihoo waanee wocheeqqa ta tunii beeti shuunoo taachon miixaa beetone;
Tunatee ittoshi ta bago ittoshi tuno qajitoyich ibariyaachotine.
Ta bageena'o ta qaaroon waayaa beetina'one; tawoo boonoshin arii beeto taane; boonoshiyoo taan dabbii beetina'one.
Tawoo boonoshich bulli yemeenee kashoon immemmo taane; bulli yemeenee shiwaree qaaqqooch giyaachemmina'one. Boonoshin ta kishoochee boggemmo koniyolla aalloone.
Boonoshin taach immiti ta Nihoo bulliyee beshoone; ta Nihoochi kishoochee bogon koniyolla hakkaachemmone.
Taannaa Nihoo Yeerina ikkoo noone" iye.
Arooba Ayihudeena'o biin yexiree wuxiya wochinnoon xaqqoon tiijiyeete.
Yesuusi boonoshich "Ta nihoo waanee wocheeqqa wodda de'a mooyon ittoshich bekkiito taane; hini ta shuunati shuunoochee aabichiye taan xaqqoona ittoshi yexxemmo?" iye.
Ayihudeena'o wochiqqi, "Ne naagoyichalli de'oon ne shuunatoyich neen yexaachone; ne ashi bushoo tunaachaa ne qelloon Yeeri ne tuniitoyichiye" iyeete.
Yesuusi ishichiqqi boonoshich wochiye:- "Yeeri ' "Ittoshiyoo nuggushoo ittoshine" ito taane' iqqi bi gettito ittoshi callooch kooreyaanoona?
Yaafa Macaafee qaaro shaddeyoon hakkaache; hini bi qaaroon waayatina'on, Yeeri 'Ittoshiyoo nuggushoo ittoshine' bi itoyeena,
'Yeerichi Bushoo taane' ta itoyich Nihoo Yeeri yaafiton, shawee toommoochoo bi deejiton 'Naaggaahine!' iyotina?
Illa ta, ta Nihoo shunniti shuunoon ta shuuno qayi gaata, taan ibariyaayote!

Tunatee ta shuuna gaata, taanolla ittoshi ibariyoo qayi gaata, Nihoo Yeeri taanna tookkii bi tunoon, tawoo Nihoo Yeerina tookkii ta tunoon xiishiree ittoshi ariiyemmoyich, ta shuunoon ibariibote!" iye.
Ebich wochiqqi biin yecha qaawiyeete; tunatee boonoshi kishoochee muricciye.
Arooba Yesuusi shiichiqqi Yowannisi aacona afaalliibee echati xaa'oo Yooridanoosi Aacoyee beqach wochinnoon hammiqqi arooch kotahe.
Wodda asheena'o bi waan waaheete. Boonoshinaa boonoshina "Yowannisi ikka mallatoonolla bekiyaanoone; tunaballi Yowannisi hini uroochon bi gettito bulli ibaroone" iyeete.
Aroochaa meeti asheena'o boonoshi mulloon Yesuusichi toommooch too'iiheete.
Maariyaminaa bi manee Maaritina beeti Bitaana Alazaari gettee beeti ikka uro beehe; biyoo biiyahe.
Hini ara Maariyami shittoon Doono Yesuusichi baatooch ukkiichaa bi qelli eexona hiditi ureene; wotta biiyati Alazaariyoo bi manoone.
Ebich bi maneena'o Maritinaa Maariyamina "Ta Doonocho! Ne shunnaa beeti Alazaari biiyatone" iqqi bi waan wochoon daachiiheete.
Yesuusiyoo ishin waayaqqi ishichiye:- "Alazaari biiyato, Yeerichi Bushoo hini bi biiyee naboona bi oogemmoyich Yeerichi oogoyichalli hini biiyoona qitaachemmone" iye.
Yesuusi Maaritinaa bi maneenon, Alazaarinoo oogichii shunnii beetone.
Alazaarichi biiyoon Yesuusi waayatoyee gub, arooba bi beeti xaa'ooch gutta qeyiye.
Ebiyee gub, bi dabbeena'oyich "Yihudee Shawooch wottaree hambone" iye.
Bi dabbeena'o "Dojachocho! Arooch beeti Ayihudeena'o giishacha aaboyee aaf neen xaqqoona yexiree wuxiya qaawitina'one; and wottaree boonoshi waan hamma inne?" iyeete.
Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi, "Ikka heeyo aaraa gutta saato toona? Araddoona sha'aa beeto koniyolla bi bee gaata, hini shaweexi bekkoon beeggemmone; ebich dihaachemmone.
Tunatee xumoona sha'aa beeto koniyolla bi bee gaata, biich bi mandaratoyich dihemmone" iye.
Ebin bi gettitoyee gub wochinnoon "No shunachi Alazaari tokkatatone; tunaballi biin tokkatoochee tiijiya hammaa beeto taane" iye.
Ebich bi dabbeena'o "Doonocho! Tokkatoo biin yechito tuna gaata, wodemmone" iyeete.
Tunatee Yesuusi "Tokkatatone" iqqi bi gettito, "Qititone" getone; tunaballi tokkateechon bi gettito boonoshich shaahiye.
Ebich arooba Yesuusi kaacha "Alazaari qititone;
Ittoshi mulloon ta toommooch too'iyoona ittoshi kupphemmoyich, arooch ta beemi qayoyich emirihoye; ittoshichoo gaawatone. And bi waan hambone" iye.
Ebich "Qaapoo" gettee beeti Toomaasi bara Yesuusichi dabbeena'oyich "Biinna tookkiree qitibone; hambone" iye.
Yesuusi Bitaana shaggiqqi, "Alazaari qitii bi duukkato hanaach awudda qemone" geton waayahe.
Hini Bitaani Yerusalemee bi wokkii beeto keeja kiilee meetir bedoone.
Boonoshi manoo qititoyich Maaritinaa Maariyaminon goggiyoyich, Ayihudeena'ochi daggoochee meetina'o waaheete.
Ebiyee gub, Maariti Yesuusi womon waayaqqa biin giijiya kechahan; tunatee Maariyami kexooch kotaa beehan.
Maaritiyoo Yesuusich "Ta Doonocho! Hiniich ne beeto gaata, ta manoo qitaacheshone.
Tunaballi Yeeri ne qollammo bullin neech bi tuniiyemmo tunoon arii beeti taane" iyan.
Yesuusiyoo "Ne manoo qitii bi duukkatoochee kechemmone" iye.
Maaritiyoo "Ciireexi aabooba qitii duukkatina'ona tookki kechemmo bi tunoon arii beeti taane" iyan.
Yesuusiyoo "Qitii duukkatina'oyich kashoon imiree kichemmo taane. Bi mulloon ta toommooch too'ii beeto bi qititeenolla kashachon tunemmone;
kashacho tunaqqi bi mulloon ta toommooch too'ii beeto bulli, bulli yemeenoon qitaachemmone. Ebin ibariinne?" iqqi echahe.
Areyoo "Eeha, ta Doonocho! Ne 'Hini shawee toommooch woyemmone' getteeti Kiristoosi Yeerichi Bushoo ne tunoon ibariiti taane" iyan.
Maariti ishichiichaa wottaqqa kexooch giyahan. Bi manee Maariyamin ceeggaa bad wochiqqa, "Dojacho waatone; neen ceeggii beetone" iyan.
Are ishin waayaqqa afaafinoona tiyaa bi waan hammahan.
Yesuusi Maaritina tookkii bi danati xaa'oochalli bi beeto bat gafooch giyaanoone.
Biin goggiya tookkii kexooch kotaa beeti Ayihudeena'o Maariyami afaafinoona tiyaa bi hamon beeggiqqi, "Maashoochaa eepaniye tiyaa bi hammato" iqqi kechii biin dabbiyeete.
Maariyami Yesuusi beetooch waa biin ciinnaa bi baatooch dihiqqa, "Ta Doonocho! Hiniich ne beeto gaata, ta manoo qitaacheshone" iyan.
Yesuusi are eefee, wotta biinna tookkii waati Ayihudeena'o eefee ciinniqqi bi giidoo qajaqqi ayiniye; goggemmonoo mawiihe.
"Aabiichiye ittoshi duukkito?" iye. Boonoshiyoo "No Doonocho! Waaree beege!" iyeete.
Yesuusi acimoon ukkiye.
Arooba arooch beeti Ayihudeena'o "Aabichiqqi Alazaarin bi shunnii beeto gaata beegote!" iyeete.
Tunatee boonoshi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o "Hini aaf doogoochi aafoon ciinniiti uro, hinin wotta bi qitaachemmoyich tuniyoon mawiiha?" iyeete.
Yesuusi wochinnoon oogichii ayiniqqi Alazaari duukkati maasho beetooch hammiye. Opoo xaqqee kexone; kelloo xaqqoona keppheetone.
Yesuusi "Xaqqoon tiiji bayote!" iye. Qititi uroochi manee Maariti "Ta Doonocho! Bi duukkato hanaach awudda qemone. Ebich hanaach beddaahee shaa'o qayaachemmone" iyan.
Yesuusi " 'Ta gettaton ne ibarii gaata, Yeerichi oogee yiiroon beeggemmi neene' getaachota?" iye.
Asheena'oo xaqqoon tiijiyeete. Yesuusi kaama wottaa shimaayooch ciinniqqi, "Ta Nihoocho! Taachon ne waayatoyich neen gallatahoye.
Bulli aaboon ne waayoon arii beeto taane; tunaballi taan ne deejoon boonoshi ibariiyemmoyich, hini ta guudoona neexati asheena'oyicha iqqa ishin gettahoye" iye.
Ishichiqqi bi corootitoyee gub bi qaaroon oogichiqqi, "Alazaaro! Waa keye!" iqqi ceeggiye.
Qititi uro bi kishoo, bi baatoo kaafee duukkati kaafanoona tookkii, bi aafoo bi kaapatona kechiye. Yesuusi "Biishote! Hambe" iye.
Arooba Maariyam waan waaqqi Yesuusi tuniiton beeggiti Ayihudeena'oochee meetina'o boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iiheete;
Tunatee boonoshi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o Fariseena'o waan hammiqqi Yesuusi tuniiton gettiyeete.
Ebich qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa Fariseena'ona Ayihudee nallachina'on kiciqqi, "Aabichibona? Hini uro meeti mallatoon bekkii beehe amoone!
Cikkii no qayi gaata, asheena'o bulli bi waan wottemmina'one; Roomee Shawee ukkureena'o waaree Yeerich no goyinnaa beeti yaafee kexo beeti xaa'oon, no aagatoonoo aalliiyemmina'one" iyeete.
Aroobee natooba qeeshee guudo tunati Qeyaafi gettee beeti, boonoshi daggoochee ikkoo "Ittoshi amoonolla ariyaachotine.
Asheena'o bulli boonoshi aalloye, ikka uro boonoshi keroyich bi qitoo ittoshich kettoo tunoon shalligaachotina?" iye.
Ishin bi gettito, bi qelloona ariiqqi toonoone; tunaballi aroobee natooba qeeshee guudo bi tunatoyich, Yesuusi Ayihudeena'ochi keroyich bi qitemmon keemmiye;
Bi qitemmo, shacaqqi bari bara shawooch beeti Yeerichi Bushiisheena'on wotta ikkooch bi kicemmoyichalli, Ayihudeena'oyich baach toonoone.
Ebich Qeyaafi nallachina'oyich bi gettiti ara aaboochee tiijiqqi Yesuusin wuxoyich echeeheete.

Ebichi naboona aroyee gub Yesuusi Ayihudeena'ochi daggooch xalla bekkaqqi sha'ataanoone; tunaballi aroochee tiyiqqi barahee ga'ooch beeti shawoo, Efiremi gettee beeti katamooch hammiye; arooch bi dabbeena'ona tookkii kotahe.
Ayihudeena'o baarii beeti Beshee Baaroo katinniye. Dofee asheena'o boonoshi qelloon boonoshi xalliiyemmoyich, ebi Beshee Baaroyee shiichiqqi boonoshi beeti shawoochee Yerusalem waaheete.
Boonoshiyoo Yesuusin qaawii beeheete; Yaafee Kechi kakallee daggooch neexaqqi boonoshinaa boonoshina "Ittoshich amo shaahii beete? Baarooch waataacheha?" iibee yibbaataheete.
Aroyee aaf qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'o, Fariseena'oo biin yecha qaawiqqi, "Yesuusi beeti xaa'oon arii beeti asho bi bee gata, waaree nooch gete!" itina'one.
Yesuusi, Beshee Baaroon shiritta qemooch geddiichii, qitii bi duukkatoochee bi kichiti Alazaari beeti Bitaana hammiye.
Aroochaanoo xumi maayoon qanniiheete; Maaritiyoo boonoshich giddiihan; Alazaariyoo biinna tookkii kotatina'ochi daggoochee ikkoone.
Maariyami qachi neetira beda naaridoosi gettee beeti oogati aaxxi shittoon deebaqqa Yesuusichi baatooch ukkiyan; bi qelli eexona bi baatoon hidiyan. Ebi shittee cinno kechi ikkotahe.
Tunaballi Yesuusi dabbeena'ochi daggoochee ikkoo, biin beshiiree immemmi Asqorootachi Yihudi
"Hini shittoon wodda balla birawoona kemee, iriteetina'oyich amoyich immeyaache?" iye.
Ishin bi gettito, gaayo bi tunatoyichalli, iriteetina'oyich ariqqaqqi toonoone; gija yesha kojoon kallaqqi kojee daggooch kicee beetoochee bi qellich bi deqqi beetoyichiye.
Yesuusiyoo "Qayote! Hini shittoon ta duukkeeyemmi aaboyich qanniiqqa quyatine.
Girachina'o bulli araddoon ittoshina tookkiiniye boonoshi beeto; tunaballi ta bulli araddoon ittoshina tookki beetaachemmo taane" iye.
Ayihudeena'ochi daggoochee meeti asheena'o Yesuusi Bitaana bi beemon ariiqqi waaheete; boonoshi waato, qitii bi duukkatoochee bi kichiti Alazaarinoo beeggalli Yesuusi ikketon baach toonoone.
Ebich qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'o Alazaarin wotta wuxiya echeeheete;
Ebiyoo Ayihudeena'ochi daggoochee meetina'o bi naboona boonoshin qajiichii boonoshi mulloon Yesuusichi toommooch boonoshi too'iitoyichiye.
Dechara Beshee Baaroon baaroyich waati meeti asheena'o "Yesuusi Yerusalem woyemmone" getee waayaqqi,
yeebbee waamon dapii yechii Yesuusin giijiya kechiqqi, "Yeeri gallateebe! Doono Yeerichi shigoona waa beeti Isra'eelee Taatoo diireebe!" iibee cookeeheete.
Ebiyee aaf "Yerusalemi asheena'ote! Shattaahotine! Ebiyoche, ittoshi taatoo kuree bushoon yebbaree woyemmone" getee bi kooreetoomon Yesuusi kuree bushoon danaqqi yebbahe.
Yesuusichi dabbeena'o arooba ebin shalligaaneena'one; tunaballi Yesuusi shimaayooch bi kechitoyee gub, "Hini biichon Yaafa Macaafooch kooreeton ceechito noone" iqqi shalligiyeete.
Ebiyee aaf Yesuusi Alazaarin qitii bi duukkati opoochee ceeggiqqi bi kichiyooba, biinna tookkii beeti asheena'o tunati mooyon miixaa beeheete.
Ebich hini mallatoon bi tuniyoon waayati dofee asheena'o wotta biin giijiya kechiyeete.
