Qitii boonoshi duukkatoochee shiichiree kechemmina'o diireetina'onaa Yeerich yaafeetina'onaniye; guttinnee qitoon qitaacheete; ebi getoo bulli yemeenee qaaqqee baharooch dupeyaacheete getone; boonoshiyoo Yeerinaa bi kaacciti Kiristoosinochi qeesheena'o tunemmina'one; Kiristoosina tookkiree hini huma naton taatemmina'one.
Huma nato ciirahee, Sheexaanoo bi cuchatoochee biicheeyemmone;
shawee awudda kelloona beeti aagateena'on, Googinaa Maagooginon bi muricciiyemmoyich ginee koyee xaa'ooch kiciya kechemmone; boonoshi haddoo "Ebine" getteyaani humaa xumeena'one.

Boonoshiyoo kechiqqi shawoo bullin ceenniyeete; yaafeetina'o beeti xaa'oonaa Yeeri shunnii beeti katameenon giichii guuddiyeete; tunaballi arooba qaaqqoo shimaaj beeti Yeer waanee kindiqqi boonoshin maahe.
Boonoshin muricciiti Daabiloosiyoo, cooxonaa koota keemachona dupati, qaaqqoonaa waagaroona miccii beeti baharooch dupahe; bulli yemeenoon araddoonaa xumoonon xuuxemmina'one.
Aroyee gub ooga nacca taatee qeenon, bi toommoochoo kotaton beeggo; shawoonaa shimaayoona bi aafoochee aallaheete; guttinnoon danataaneena'one.

Qititina'o, gishiisheena'onaa ogoogeena'ona qeechi aafooch neexaqqi boonoshi beetee beeggo; macaafeena'o gaxxeeheete; wotta bara macaafoo gaxxeehe; aroo kashee macaafoone; qititina'oyich macaafeena'ooch kooreetoomon boonoshi shuuni shuunoomona boonoshi toommooch nalleehe.

Baharo bi daggooch beeti qititina'on aapphiye; qitoonaa qititina'o kicee beeti xaa'oona boonoshi waan beeti qititina'on aapphiyeete; aroochee bi ikki ikkoyich bi shuuni shuunoomona bi toommooch nalleehe.
Qitoonaa qititina'o kicee beeti xaa'oona qaaqqee baharooch dupaheete; ebi qaaqqee baharooch dupo guttinnee qitoone.
Bi shigoo kashee macaafooch kooreeqqi danataani asho koniyolla qaaqqee baharooch dupahe.
Aroyee gub andra shawoonaa andra shimaayoonon beeggo; aafi shawoonaa aafi shimaayoona beshatone; baharoo ebiyee bek aalloone.
Yaafa katamee, biyoo andra Yerusalemi, kenooch hamma macacikkiti tahoon tahaa qannii tiyati wo'een shaahiqqa shimaaj beeti Yeer waanee bi kindii beetee beeggo.

Aree hillooch ooga qaaro qeenoochee kechiqqi, "Ebiyoche! Yeerichi qeyi xaa'oo asheena'ochi daggooch tunatone; boonoshina tookki beeyemmone; boonoshiyoo bi asheena'o tunemmina'one; Yeeriyoo bi qelloona boonoshina tookki tunaree boonoshi Nuggushoo tunemmone.
Biyoo acimoon boonoshi aafoochee hidemmone; aafi mooyina'o boonoshi beshatoyich, ebiyee bek qitoo aalloone; muushano tunabe, eefo tunabe, biiyoo tunabe aalloone" iqqi bi getee waayaho.
Taatee qeenooch kotati Yeeri "Ebiyoche! Bulli mooyon andriiyemmo taane" iye. Daakkiqqinoo taach "Ebi qaaro gibaneetonaa ibaroona bi tunatoyich kooribe!" iye.
Wotta taach ishichiye:- "Illa mooyo bulli ceennitone. Alifoonaa Oomeegoona, Shiichoonaa Tacona taane; shachawatoyich kashee aachi xuuphoochee baad cikki immemmo taane;
gondoochi giidoon kochii wochitoyich ebin tuniiyemmo taane; biich Nuggushoon tunemmo taane; biyoo ta bushoon tunemmone.

Tunaballi shateena'o, boonoshi mulloon Kiristoosichi toommooch too'iyaaneena'o, gonda mooyon shuunoona ee'atina'o, ashoon wuxiitina'o, shuni maayeena'o, iicachina'o, shaahiitee shuuneeti nuggushoyich goyinnaa beetina'o, kooteena'o bulliyoo dupeeyemmi xaa'oo qaaqqoonaa waagaroona miccii beeti baharoochiye; ebiyoo guttinnee qitoone" iye.

Aree hillooch ciireexi shabaatta naxo ceenniti shabaatta xoofeena'on yechiti shabaatta maraakeena'oochee ikkoo waaqqi taan "Hach ta waan wobe! Yeerichi Bagoochi mechee tunemmi wo'een neech bekkiibana" iqqi gettiye.

Yeerichi Ayaanee giidoo ta toommooch tunatee, ara maraakoo oogati genja guudi toommooch taan kichiye; Yeerichi oogee yiiroo beeti yaafa katamee Yerusalemi shimaaj beeti Yeer waanee bi kindii beetee taach bekkiihe; bi aaxxoo yaasphiidi gettee beeti ooga aaxxi xaqqoomi shaahiichaa, bi daggoona beshii bekkii beeti buriciqoomine.

Bi guudoona gayeeti gayo oogati genjoone; aaraa gutta kellachone; aaraa gutta kelloon quyaa beeti aaraa gutta maraakeena'o neexatina'one; ebi aaraa gutta kellooch aaraa gutta Isra'eelee yoodeena'ochi shigo kooreetone.
Aabi keyo waan keeja kello, aabi kechaa yoocha bad keeja kello, aabi kechaa qanna bad keeja kello, aabi gimo waanoo keeja kello beetone.
Ara katamechi gayo shuuneeto aaraa gutta xaqqeena'ochi toommoochiye; ebi aaraa gutta xaqqeena'ochi toommooch Yeerichi Bago wochati aaraa gutta mishiraachachina'ochi shigo kooreetone.
Taach gettiti maraakoo hini ara katameen, bi gayoonaa bi kelloonon qellaayiya aachee gumboon yechitone.

Katamechi awudda guudoona beeti awudda daabbeena'o tateena'one; katamechi giddoonoo bi kishooch beeti aachee gumboona qellaayiye; gutta humaa awudda balla kiilee metiro tunahan; bi maaco, bi gidoonaa neexoona tatoone.
Gayee neexoon qellaayiye; ashi qellaayoona maraakoo qellaayiti qellaayee gumboona balli aabbaa awudda hiroo tunahe.
Katamechi gayo gayeeto yaasphiidi gettee beeti aaxxi xaqqoocheeniye; katameyoo buriciqoomi xalla aachoona shuuneetine.

Katamee gayee dechiich beeti xaqqeena'ochi achooch bari bara mallatachi xaqqeena'o beetina'one. Gayee dechiich beeti ikkinnee xaqqo yaasphiidi, guttinnoo sapiiri, keejinnoo kaliqidoon, awuddinnoo marigidi,

uuchinnoo saridooniisi, shirittinnoo saridiyooni, shabaattinnoo kirisiloobi, shimittinnoo beriloosi, yiixiyinnoo topphaziyooni, aashirinnoo kiripaasi, aaraa ikkinnoo yaakinti, aaraa guttinnoo amesxoosi, eboshine.

Katamee aaraa gutta kelleena'o aaraa gutta inqoo gettee beeti waccii beeti xaqqeena'one; ikka kello ikki ikka inqoona shuuneetone. Katamee daggeexi gommo bi daggoona beshii bekkii beeti buriciqoomi xalla aachoona shuuneetone.
Beshi Hakkachi Doono Yeerinaa Yeerichi Bagoona hini ara katamechi yaafa kexo boonoshi tunatoyich, arooch yaafa kexon beegaano taane
Katamechoo Yeerichi oogee yiiroo aaxxaa beetoyich, bi ceechoo Yeerichi Bago bi tunatoyich, aabechi aaxxo oohee aganechi aaxxo qaawiyaachemmone.
Aagateena'o bi bekkoona sha'emmina'one; shawee toommeexi taateena'o boonoshi gaannoon bi waan deebemmina'one.
Aroochoo xumo aalloone; ebich katamee kelleena'o ciroona hicceyaachemmina'one.
Aagateena'oo boonoshi gijoonaa gaannoonon bi waan giijemmina'one.

Yeerichi Bago kashee macaafooch boonoshi shigo kooreetina'oyee beshatee, amashee ee'a mooyo tunabe, tiyaarii beeti mooyon shuunaa beeto, oohee kootoon koottii beeti asho hini ara katameech ciroona giyaachemmone.

Aroyee gub ebi ara maraakoo taach bi bekkiito, Yeerinaa Yeeri Bagoonochi taatee qeenoochee kechii, ara katamechi daggeexi ooga gommi gutta daggoona ufaa beeti, bi daggooch beeton bekkii beeti buriciqoomi kashee aaconiye; aachi okkinaa hachinooch natooch aaraa gutta kaalloon aafaa beeti kashee mixo beehe; hini ara michi waamo aagateena'oyich attoone.

Ebiyee bek hini ara katameech Yeerina upati asho oohee upati mooyo beetaachemmone; Yeerinaa Yeerichi Bagoonochi taatee qeeno ara katamee daggooch tunemmone; Yeerichi maddachina'o aroochaa biich goyinnemmina'one
Yeerinoo boonoshi hajee aafoona beeggemmina'one; bi shigoo boonoshi barooch tunemmone.
Ebiyee bek xumo beetaachemmone; Doono Yeeriyoo boonoshich bekko tunemmone; ebich ceechee bekkoonaa aabee aaxxoona boonoshich qaawiyaachemmone; bulli yemeenoon taatemmina'one.

Ebi ara maraakoo taach Neech gettati mooyina'o gibaneetina'onaa ibareena'onaniye; bi Ayaanoon bi keemachina'oyich immiti Doono Yeeri katini aabee daggooch tunemmi mooyon bi maddachina'oyich bekkiiya iqqi bi maraakoon wochaa deejiye" iye.
Yesuusi Ebiyoche! Kaataree woyemmo taane; hini macaafooch kooreeti qaaroon waayaa quyaa beetina'o diireetina'one" iye.
Ebinoo ta waamona waayato, ta aafoonoo beeggato, Yowannisi taane; ta waayaa beeggahooba, ebin taach bekkiiti maraakoyich goyinniya bi baatooch baroona guufaho.

Tunaballi aroo Neen ariibe! Eechiyaahine! Neechoomon, keemachi ne maneena'ochoomon, hini macaafooch kooreeton waayaa quyaa beetina'ochoomon Yeerich maddii beeti maddacho taane; Yeerich baachiye ne goyinnemmo!" iye.
Taach daakkiqqi ishichiye:- Yemeeno katinnitone; ebich hini macaafeexi keemee qaaroon opiyaahine!
Hukkacho hukkoon andoo shuuna beebe; tiyaarii beeti shuunoon shuunaa beeto andoo shuuna beebe; cadiqa asho andoo cadiqee shuunoon shuuna beebe; yaafeeti ashoo andoo bi yaafittinoona beebe" iye.
Yesuusiyoo ishichiye:- Ebiyoche! Kaataree woyemmo taane; asho bi ikki ikkoyich ta qoccemmi bi shuuni shuunee gatiyoon yeshireeshiye ta woyemmo.
Alifoonaa Oomeegoona, Aafichonaa Gubbichona, Shiichoonaa Tacona taane" iye.
Boonoshich daaggeetee, katamee kelloona katamee maac giyiree kashee michi aafoochee boonoshi maayemmoyich, boonoshi qoraddoon machii xallii beetina'o diireetina'one.

Tiyaarii beeti mooyon shuunaa beetina'o, kaayachina'o, shuni maayeena'o, ashoon wuxii beetina'o, shaahiitee shuuneeti nuggushoyich goyinnaa beetina'o, kootee kooton shunnii beetina'onaa kootee kooton doyitina'o bullinoyich hini ara katameech gimo ciroona daaggeyaache.
Ta Yesuusi kittinnee guuphina'o tunati ittoshich ebi bullin bi gettemmoyich ta maraakoon wochato taane. Daawitichi colloonaa yaroona taane; aaxxaa beeti haree xojanoomo taane" iye.

Yaafa Ayaanoonaa Bagoochi wo'eena Yesuuso! Wobe! ii beetina'one. Ishin waayaa beeto bulli Yesuuso! Wobe! gete. Shachawato bulli wobe; qaawii beeto bulliyoo kashoon immii beeti aacon baad cikki daambe.

Hini macaafooch ta kooriti keemee qaaroon waayaa beeto bullich xiishii gettoye; koniyolla hinichi toommooch amashee mooyinolla bi daakki gaata, Yeeri hini macaafee daggooch kooreeti naxeena'on bi toommooch kindiiyemmone.

Wotta koniyolla hini macaafooch ta kooriti keemee qaaroochee amashee mooyinolla bi shapii gaata, hini macaafooch kooreeti kashoon immii beeti michi aafoochee bi maataachemmoyich, wotta yaafa katameechoo giyiree bi beetaachemmoyich, Yeeri biin bajemmone.
Ebi mooyina'on gettii beeto Eeha; kaataree woyemmo taane ii beetone. Tookkona; Doono Yesuuso! Wobe!
No Doono Yesuus Kiristoosichi wojoo ittoshi bullina tookki tunabe. 1
